ÁêÜËÆ∫‰∏äÈÄíÂΩíÂíåËø≠‰ª£Êó∂Èó¥Â§çÊùÇÂ∫¶ÊñπÈù¢ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÂÆûÈôÖÂ∫îÁî®‰∏≠ÔºàÂáΩÊï∞Ë∞ÉÁî®ÂíåÂáΩÊï∞Ë∞ÉÁî®Â†ÜÊ†àÁöÑÂºÄÈîÄÔºâÈÄíÂΩíÊØîËø≠‰ª£ÊïàÁéáË¶Å‰Ωé„ÄÇ

‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÁöÑÈÄíÂΩíÈÅçÂéÜ(ÈÄíÂΩíÈùûÂ∏∏ÈáçË¶ÅÔºÅÔºÅÔºÅ)

‰∏ÄÁúãÂ∞±‰ºöÔºå‰∏ÄÂÜôÂ∞±Â∫üÔºÅ

È¶ñÂÖàË¶ÅÁü•ÈÅìÈÄíÂΩíÁÆóÊ≥ïÁöÑ‰∏â‰∏™Ë¶ÅÁ¥†Ôºö

  1. Á°ÆÂÆöÈÄíÂΩíÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ÂíåËøîÂõûÂÄºÔºö
    Á°ÆÂÆöÂì™‰∫õÂèÇÊï∞ÊòØÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÈúÄË¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±Âú®ÈÄíÂΩíÂáΩÊï∞ÈáåÂä†‰∏äËøô‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºå Âπ∂‰∏îËøòË¶ÅÊòéÁ°ÆÊØèÊ¨°ÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑËøîÂõûÂÄºÊòØ‰ªÄ‰πàËøõËÄåÁ°ÆÂÆöÈÄíÂΩíÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑËøîÂõûÁ±ªÂûã„ÄÇ

  2. Á°ÆÂÆöÁªàÊ≠¢Êù°‰ª∂Ôºö
    ÂÜôÂÆå‰∫ÜÈÄíÂΩíÁÆóÊ≥ï, ËøêË°åÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÁªèÂ∏∏‰ºöÈÅáÂà∞Ê†àÊ∫¢Âá∫ÁöÑÈîôËØØÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØÊ≤°ÂÜôÁªàÊ≠¢Êù°‰ª∂ÊàñËÄÖÁªàÊ≠¢Êù°‰ª∂ÂÜôÁöÑ‰∏çÂØπÔºåÊìç‰ΩúÁ≥ªÁªü‰πüÊòØÁî®‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê†àÁöÑÁªìÊûÑÊù•‰øùÂ≠òÊØè‰∏ÄÂ±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÈÄíÂΩíÊ≤°ÊúâÁªàÊ≠¢ÔºåÊìç‰ΩúÁ≥ªÁªüÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÊ†àÂøÖÁÑ∂Â∞±‰ºöÊ∫¢Âá∫„ÄÇ

  3. Á°ÆÂÆöÂçïÂ±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÈÄªËæëÔºö
    Á°ÆÂÆöÊØè‰∏ÄÂ±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÈúÄË¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇÂú®ËøôÈáå‰πüÂ∞±‰ºöÈáçÂ§çË∞ÉÁî®Ëá™Â∑±Êù•ÂÆûÁé∞ÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑËøáÁ®ã„ÄÇ

‰ª•‰∏ã‰ª•ÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜ‰∏∫‰æãÔºö

  1. Á°ÆÂÆöÈÄíÂΩíÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞ÂíåËøîÂõûÂÄºÔºöÂõ†‰∏∫Ë¶ÅÊâìÂç∞Âá∫ÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊï∞ÂÄºÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂèÇÊï∞ÈáåÈúÄË¶Å‰º†ÂÖ•vectorÂú®ÊîæËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊï∞ÂÄºÔºåÈô§‰∫ÜËøô‰∏ÄÁÇπÂ∞±‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂú®Â§ÑÁêÜ‰ªÄ‰πàÊï∞ÊçÆ‰∫Ü‰πü‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÊúâËøîÂõûÂÄºÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÈÄíÂΩíÂáΩÊï∞ËøîÂõûÁ±ªÂûãÂ∞±ÊòØvoidÔºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

    void traversal(TreeNode* cur, vector<int>& vec)

  2. Á°ÆÂÆöÁªàÊ≠¢Êù°‰ª∂ÔºöÂú®ÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÔºåÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÁÆóÊòØÈÄíÂΩíÁªìÊùü‰∫ÜÂë¢ÔºåÂΩìÁÑ∂ÊòØÂΩìÂâçÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÊòØÁ©∫‰∫ÜÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊú¨Â±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÂ∞±Ë¶ÅË¶ÅÁªìÊùü‰∫ÜÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â¶ÇÊûúÂΩìÂâçÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑËøô‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊòØÁ©∫ÔºåÂ∞±Áõ¥Êé•returnÔºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

    if (cur == NULL) return;

  3. Á°ÆÂÆöÂçïÂ±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÈÄªËæëÔºöÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÊòØ‰∏≠Â∑¶Âè≥ÁöÑÂæ™Â∫èÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âú®ÂçïÂ±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÈÄªËæëÔºåÊòØË¶ÅÂÖàÂèñ‰∏≠ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊï∞ÂÄºÔºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

    vec.push_back(cur->val);    // ‰∏≠traversal(cur->left, vec);  // Â∑¶traversal(cur->right, vec); // Âè≥

ÂçïÂ±ÇÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÈÄªËæëÂ∞±ÊòØÊåâÁÖß‰∏≠Â∑¶Âè≥ÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫èÊù•Â§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÔºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

class Solution {public:    void traversal(TreeNode* cur, vector<int>& vec) {        if (cur == NULL) return;        vec.push_back(cur->val);    // ‰∏≠        traversal(cur->left, vec);  // Â∑¶        traversal(cur->right, vec); // Âè≥    }    vector<int> preorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        vector<int> result;        traversal(root, result);        return result;    }};

‰∏≠Â∫èÂíåÂêéÂ∫è‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºö

void traversal(TreeNode* cur, vector<int>& vec) {    if (cur == NULL) return;    traversal(cur->left, vec);  // Â∑¶    vec.push_back(cur->val);    // ‰∏≠    traversal(cur->right, vec); // Âè≥}

ÂêéÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºö

void traversal(TreeNode* cur, vector<int>& vec) {    if (cur == NULL) return;    traversal(cur->left, vec);  // Â∑¶    traversal(cur->right, vec); // Âè≥    vec.push_back(cur->val);    // ‰∏≠}

‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÁöÑËø≠‰ª£ÈÅçÂéÜ

Âê¨ËØ¥ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÈùûÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÊñπÂºè

ÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞Â∞±ÊòØÔºöÊØè‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÈÄíÂΩíË∞ÉÁî®ÈÉΩ‰ºöÊääÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑÂ±ÄÈÉ®ÂèòÈáè„ÄÅÂèÇÊï∞ÂÄºÂíåËøîÂõûÂú∞ÂùÄÁ≠âÂéãÂÖ•Ë∞ÉÁî®Ê†à‰∏≠ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÈÄíÂΩíËøîÂõûÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºå‰ªéÊ†àÈ°∂ÂºπÂá∫‰∏ä‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑÂêÑÈ°πÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ËøôÂ∞±ÊòØÈÄíÂΩí‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÂèØ‰ª•ËøîÂõû‰∏ä‰∏ÄÂ±Ç‰ΩçÁΩÆÁöÑÂéüÂõ†„ÄÇ

ÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºàËø≠‰ª£Ê≥ïÔºâ

ÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÊòØ‰∏≠Â∑¶Âè≥ÔºåÊØèÊ¨°ÂÖàÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÊòØ‰∏≠Èó¥ËäÇÁÇπÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂÖàÂ∞ÜÊ†πËäÇÁÇπÊîæÂÖ•Ê†à‰∏≠ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂ∞ÜÂè≥Â≠©Â≠êÂä†ÂÖ•Ê†àÔºåÂÜçÂä†ÂÖ•Â∑¶Â≠©Â≠ê„ÄÇ

‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàË¶ÅÂÖàÂä†ÂÖ• Âè≥Â≠©Â≠êÔºåÂÜçÂä†ÂÖ•Â∑¶Â≠©Â≠êÂë¢Ôºü Âõ†‰∏∫ËøôÊ†∑Âá∫Ê†àÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÊâçÊòØ‰∏≠Â∑¶Âè≥ÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫è„ÄÇ

Âä®ÁîªÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

‰∏çÈöæÂÜôÂá∫Â¶Ç‰∏ã‰ª£Á†Å: ÔºàÊ≥®ÊÑè‰ª£Á†Å‰∏≠Á©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†àÔºâ

class Solution {public:    vector<int> preorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        stack<TreeNode*> st;        vector<int> result;        if (root == NULL) return result;        st.push(root);        while (!st.empty()) {            TreeNode* node = st.top();                       // ‰∏≠            st.pop();            result.push_back(node->val);            if (node->right) st.push(node->right);           // Âè≥ÔºàÁ©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†àÔºâ            if (node->left) st.push(node->left);             // Â∑¶ÔºàÁ©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†àÔºâ        }        return result;    }};

‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºàËø≠‰ª£Ê≥ïÔºâ

Ê≥®ÊÑèÔºö‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜ‰∏çËÉΩÂÉèÈÄíÂΩíÈÇ£Ê†∑ÂæÆË∞ÉÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑ‰ª£Á†Å

Âú®Ëø≠‰ª£ÁöÑËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÔºåÊúâ‰∏§‰∏™Êìç‰ΩúÔºö

  1. Â§ÑÁêÜÔºöÂ∞ÜÂÖÉÁ¥†ÊîæËøõresultÊï∞ÁªÑ‰∏≠
  2. ËÆøÈóÆÔºöÈÅçÂéÜËäÇÁÇπ

ÂàÜÊûê‰∏Ä‰∏ã‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÂàöÂàöÂÜôÁöÑÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÔºå‰∏çËÉΩÂíå‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÈÄöÁî®Âë¢ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫ÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫èÊòØ‰∏≠Â∑¶Âè≥ÔºåÂÖàËÆøÈóÆÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†ÊòØ‰∏≠Èó¥ËäÇÁÇπÔºåË¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†‰πüÊòØ‰∏≠Èó¥ËäÇÁÇπÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂàöÂàöÊâçËÉΩÂÜôÂá∫Áõ∏ÂØπÁÆÄÊ¥ÅÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ë¶ÅËÆøÈóÆÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂíåË¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†È°∫Â∫èÊòØ‰∏ÄËá¥ÁöÑÔºåÈÉΩÊòØ‰∏≠Èó¥ËäÇÁÇπ„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πàÂÜçÁúãÁúã‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºå‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÊòØÂ∑¶‰∏≠Âè≥ÔºåÂÖàËÆøÈóÆÁöÑÊòØ‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÈ°∂ÈÉ®ÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÔºåÁÑ∂Âêé‰∏ÄÂ±Ç‰∏ÄÂ±ÇÂêë‰∏ãËÆøÈóÆÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞Âà∞ËææÊ†ëÂ∑¶Èù¢ÁöÑÊúÄÂ∫ïÈÉ®ÔºåÂÜçÂºÄÂßãÂ§ÑÁêÜËäÇÁÇπÔºà‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØÂú®ÊääËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊï∞ÂÄºÊîæËøõresultÊï∞ÁªÑ‰∏≠ÔºâÔºåËøôÂ∞±ÈÄ†Êàê‰∫ÜÂ§ÑÁêÜÈ°∫Â∫èÂíåËÆøÈóÆÈ°∫Â∫èÊòØ‰∏ç‰∏ÄËá¥ÁöÑ„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πàÂú®‰ΩøÁî®Ëø≠‰ª£Ê≥ïÂÜô‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê†àÁî®Êù•Â≠òÊîæÂ∑¶Â≠©Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÔºåÂ∞±ÈúÄË¶ÅÂÄüÁî®ÊåáÈíàÁöÑÈÅçÂéÜÊù•Â∏ÆÂä©ËÆøÈóÆËäÇÁÇπÔºåÊ†àÂàôÁî®Êù•Â§ÑÁêÜËäÇÁÇπ‰∏äÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†„ÄÇ

Âä®ÁîªÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÂÜôÂá∫Â¶Ç‰∏ã‰ª£Á†ÅÔºö

class Solution {public:    vector<int> inorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        vector<int> result;        stack<TreeNode*> st;        TreeNode* cur = root;        while (cur != NULL || !st.empty()) {            if (cur != NULL) { // ÊåáÈíàÊù•ËÆøÈóÆËäÇÁÇπÔºåËÆøÈóÆÂà∞ÊúÄÂ∫ïÂ±Ç                st.push(cur); // Â∞ÜËÆøÈóÆÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÊîæËøõÊ†à                cur = cur->left;                // Â∑¶            } else {                cur = st.top(); // ‰ªéÊ†àÈáåÂºπÂá∫ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØË¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÔºàÊîæËøõresultÊï∞ÁªÑÈáåÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÔºâ                st.pop();                result.push_back(cur->val);     // ‰∏≠                cur = cur->right;               // Âè≥            }        }        return result;    }};

ÂêéÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºàËø≠‰ª£Ê≥ïÔºâ

Êï∞ÁªÑÈÉ®ÂàÜÊõ¥ÊîπÂâçÂêéÈ°∫Â∫èÔºåË¶ÅËÄÉËôëÂêëÊõ¥ÊîπÂ±ÄÈÉ®ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊï¥‰ΩìÂèçËΩ¨ËøôÁßçÊÄùË∑ØËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩË°åÁöÑÈÄö

ÂÜçÊù•ÁúãÂêéÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºåÂÖàÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÊòØ‰∏≠Â∑¶Âè≥ÔºåÂêéÁª≠ÈÅçÂéÜÊòØÂ∑¶Âè≥‰∏≠ÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊàë‰ª¨Âè™ÈúÄË¶ÅË∞ÉÊï¥‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂÖàÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÈ°∫Â∫èÔºåÂ∞±ÂèòÊàê‰∏≠Âè≥Â∑¶ÁöÑÈÅçÂéÜÈ°∫Â∫èÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®ÂèçËΩ¨resultÊï∞ÁªÑÔºåËæìÂá∫ÁöÑÁªìÊûúÈ°∫Â∫èÂ∞±ÊòØÂ∑¶Âè≥‰∏≠‰∫ÜÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÔºö

ÊâÄ‰ª•ÂêéÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÂè™ÈúÄË¶ÅÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÁ®ç‰Ωú‰øÆÊîπÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•‰∫ÜÔºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

class Solution {public:    vector<int> postorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        stack<TreeNode*> st;        vector<int> result;        if (root == NULL) return result;        st.push(root);        while (!st.empty()) {            TreeNode* node = st.top();            st.pop();            result.push_back(node->val);            if (node->left) st.push(node->left); // Áõ∏ÂØπ‰∫éÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜÔºåËøôÊõ¥Êîπ‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂÖ•Ê†àÈ°∫Â∫è ÔºàÁ©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†àÔºâ            if (node->right) st.push(node->right); // Á©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†à        }        reverse(result.begin(), result.end()); // Â∞ÜÁªìÊûúÂèçËΩ¨‰πãÂêéÂ∞±ÊòØÂ∑¶Âè≥‰∏≠ÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫è‰∫Ü        return result;    }};

‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÁöÑÁªü‰∏ÄËø≠‰ª£Ê≥ï

‰∏≠Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºöÔºàËØ¶ÁªÜÊ≥®ÈáäÔºâ

class Solution {public:    vector<int> inorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        vector<int> result;        stack<TreeNode*> st;        if (root != NULL) st.push(root);        while (!st.empty()) {            TreeNode* node = st.top();            if (node != NULL) {                st.pop(); // Â∞ÜËØ•ËäÇÁÇπÂºπÂá∫ÔºåÈÅøÂÖçÈáçÂ§çÊìç‰ΩúÔºå‰∏ãÈù¢ÂÜçÂ∞ÜÂè≥‰∏≠Â∑¶ËäÇÁÇπÊ∑ªÂä†Âà∞Ê†à‰∏≠                if (node->right) st.push(node->right);  // Ê∑ªÂä†Âè≥ËäÇÁÇπÔºàÁ©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†àÔºâ                st.push(node);                          // Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏≠ËäÇÁÇπ                st.push(NULL); // ‰∏≠ËäÇÁÇπËÆøÈóÆËøáÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØËøòÊ≤°ÊúâÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂä†ÂÖ•Á©∫ËäÇÁÇπÂÅö‰∏∫Ê†áËÆ∞„ÄÇ                if (node->left) st.push(node->left);    // Ê∑ªÂä†Â∑¶ËäÇÁÇπÔºàÁ©∫ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂÖ•Ê†àÔºâ            } else { // Âè™ÊúâÈÅáÂà∞Á©∫ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊâçÂ∞Ü‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊîæËøõÁªìÊûúÈõÜ                st.pop();           // Â∞ÜÁ©∫ËäÇÁÇπÂºπÂá∫                node = st.top();    // ÈáçÊñ∞ÂèñÂá∫Ê†à‰∏≠ÂÖÉÁ¥†                st.pop();                result.push_back(node->val); // Âä†ÂÖ•Âà∞ÁªìÊûúÈõÜ            }        }        return result;    }};

ÂêåÁêÜÔºåÂâçÂ∫èÂíåÂêéÁª≠Âè™ÈúÄË¶ÅÂæÆË∞É‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂä†ÂÖ•Ê†àÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫èÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•‰∫ÜÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Âà©Áî®Ê†πËäÇÁÇπÂÖàÊääÊâÄÊúâËäÇÁÇπÊåâÁÖßÊàë‰ª¨ÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÈÅçÂéÜÊñπÊ≥ïÂ≠òÂÇ®Âà∞Ê†àÈáåÈù¢ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊääÈúÄË¶ÅÁâπÂÆöÈ°∫Â∫èÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÁî®NULLËäÇÁÇπÊ†áËÆ∞ÔºåÂç≥ÂèØÂÆûÁé∞Ëø≠‰ª£ÁöÑÁªü‰∏ÄÂÜôÊ≥ï„ÄÇ

Ëø≠‰ª£Ê≥ïÂâçÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜ

class Solution {public:    vector<int> preorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        vector<int> result;        stack<TreeNode*> st;        if (root != NULL) st.push(root);        while (!st.empty()) {            TreeNode* node = st.top();            if (node != NULL) {                st.pop();                if (node->right) st.push(node->right);  // Âè≥                if (node->left) st.push(node->left);    // Â∑¶                st.push(node);                          // ‰∏≠                st.push(NULL);            } else {                st.pop();                node = st.top();                st.pop();                result.push_back(node->val);            }        }        return result;    }};

Ëø≠‰ª£Ê≥ïÂêéÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜ

class Solution {public:    vector<int> postorderTraversal(TreeNode* root) {        vector<int> result;        stack<TreeNode*> st;        if (root != NULL) st.push(root);        while (!st.empty()) {            TreeNode* node = st.top();            if (node != NULL) {                st.pop();                st.push(node);                          // ‰∏≠                st.push(NULL);                if (node->right) st.push(node->right);  // Âè≥                if (node->left) st.push(node->left);    // Â∑¶            } else {                st.pop();                node = st.top();                st.pop();                result.push_back(node->val);            }        }        return result;    }};

‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÁöÑÂ±ÇÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜ

Â±ÇÂ∫èÈÅçÂéÜ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∫åÂèâÊ†ë„ÄÇÂ∞±ÊòØ‰ªéÂ∑¶Âà∞Âè≥‰∏ÄÂ±Ç‰∏ÄÂ±ÇÁöÑÂéªÈÅçÂéÜ‰∫åÂèâÊ†ë„ÄÇ

ÈúÄË¶ÅÂÄüÁî®‰∏Ä‰∏™ËæÖÂä©Êï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÂç≥ÈòüÂàóÊù•ÂÆûÁé∞ÔºåÈòüÂàóÂÖàËøõÂÖàÂá∫ÔºåÁ¨¶Âêà‰∏ÄÂ±Ç‰∏ÄÂ±ÇÈÅçÂéÜÁöÑÈÄªËæë„ÄÇ

class Solution {public:    vector<vector<int>> levelOrder(TreeNode* root) {        queue<TreeNode*> que;        if (root != NULL) que.push(root);        vector<vector<int>> result;        while (!que.empty()) {            int size = que.size();            vector<int> tmp;            for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {                TreeNode* node = que.front();                que.pop();                tmp.push_back(node->val);                if (node->left) que.push(node->left);                if (node->right) que.push(node->right);            }            result.push_back(tmp);        }        return result;    }};

entry.title: C++‰∏≠STLÂ∏∏Áî®Â∫ìÂáΩÊï∞
entry.content:
ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

ÊÄªÁªì‰∏ãC++‰∏≠STLÂ∏∏Áî®ÂáΩÊï∞

sort()Âø´Êéí

ÂáΩÊï∞ÂéüÂûãÔºösort(Ëµ∑ÂßãÂú∞ÂùÄ, Êú´Â∞æÂú∞ÂùÄ, cmp),ÂÖ∂‰∏≠cmpÊòØÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™Â∑±ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞Âêç,ÈªòËÆ§ÈÄíÂ¢ûÊéíÂàó

cmpÂáΩÊï∞Á§∫‰æã:

bool cmp(int &a, int &b){    return a > b;}

reverse()ÈÄÜÁΩÆ

ÂáΩÊï∞ÂéüÂûãÔºöreverse(Ëµ∑ÂßãÂú∞ÂùÄ, Êú´Â∞æÂú∞ÂùÄ)

stoi()

ÂáΩÊï∞ÂéüÂûã:stoi(stringÁ±ªÂûã)
Â∞ÜstringÁ±ªÂûãËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫intÁ±ªÂûã

unique()ÂéªÈáç

ÂáΩÊï∞ÂéüÂûãÔºöunique(Ëµ∑ÂßãÂú∞ÂùÄ, Êú´Â∞æÂú∞ÂùÄ, fun);ÂÖ∂‰∏≠fun‰∏∫Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞Âêç„ÄÇ

Ê≥®ÊÑèÔºöuniqueÂáΩÊï∞ÂéªÈáçÂπ∂‰∏çÊòØÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑÂéªÈáçÔºåÂÆÉÊòØ‰∏çÊñ≠ÁöÑÂ∞ÜÂêéÈù¢‰∏çÈáçÂ§çÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†Ë¶ÜÁõñÂâçÈù¢ÈáçÂ§çÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÊúÄÂêéËøîÂõûÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏çÈáçÂ§çÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑÂú∞ÂùÄ„ÄÇ

‰∫åÂàÜÊü•ÊâæÂáΩÊï∞

lower_bound(Ëµ∑ÂßãÂú∞ÂùÄ, Êú´Â∞æÂú∞ÂùÄ, target)ÔºöÊü•ÊâæÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ß‰∫éÁ≠â‰∫étargetÁõÆÊ†áÂÄºÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ

upper_bound(Ëµ∑ÂßãÂú∞ÂùÄ, Êú´Â∞æÂú∞ÂùÄ, target)ÔºöÊü•ÊâæÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ß‰∫étargetÁõÆÊ†áÂÄºÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ

binary_search(Ëµ∑ÂßãÂú∞ÂùÄ, Êú´Â∞æÂú∞ÂùÄ, target)ÔºöÊü•ÊâætargetÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®‰∫éÊï∞ÁªÑÊàñvector‰∏≠ÔºåÊâæÂà∞ËøîÂõûtrueÔºåÂê¶ÂàôËøîÂõûfalse

Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Êü•ÊâæÂáΩÊï∞

s1.find(s2)ÔºöÂú®s1Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏≠Êü•Êâæs2ÔºåÊü•ÊâæÂà∞ËøîÂõûÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÊü•ÊâæÂ§±Ë¥•ËøîÂõûs1.npos

set.count(a)ÔºöÊú¨Êù•ÊòØËÆ°ÁÆóaÂá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÊ¨°Êï∞Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØÁî±‰∫éÈõÜÂêà‰∏≠ÊòØÊ≤°ÊúâÈáçÂ§çÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑÔºå‰∫éÊòØcountÂáΩÊï∞‰πüÂ∞±Ë¢´‰Ωú‰∏∫Êü•ÊâæÂáΩÊï∞‰∫ÜÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫aÂè™ËÉΩÂá∫Áé∞1Ê¨°ÊàñËÄÖ0Ê¨°ÔºåÊü•ÊâæÊàêÂäüÔºåËøîÂõû1ÔºõÊü•ÊâæÂ§±Ë¥•ËøîÂõû0.

map.find()Ôºö‰∏ªË¶ÅÁî®‰∫éÊü•ÊâækeyÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®map‰∏≠Ôºå‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®ËøîÂõûmap.end()ÔºåÁî®Ê≥ïÂíåset‰∏ÄÊ†∑

vector

vector, ÂèòÈïøÊï∞ÁªÑÔºåÂÄçÂ¢ûÁöÑÊÄùÊÉ≥

ÂáΩÊï∞ÂäüËÉΩ
size()ËøîÂõûÂÖÉÁ¥†‰∏™Êï∞
empty()ËøîÂõûÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Á©∫

entry.title: LeetCodeÁ¨îËÆ∞-Ê†àÂíåÈòüÂàó
entry.content:
ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

Êú¨ÁØá‰∏∫‰∏™‰∫∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜÖÂÆπÊàñÊúâÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
ÂõæÁâáÈÉ®ÂàÜÊ∫ê‰∫é‰ª£Á†ÅÈöèÊÉ≥ÂΩïÔºå‰æµÂà†„ÄÇ

Ê†àÂíåÈòüÂàó‰∏ç‰∏∫‰∫∫Áü•ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÈù¢

Ê†àÊòØÂÖàËøõÂêéÂá∫ÔºåÈòüÂàóÊòØÂÖàËøõÂÖàÂá∫Ôºö

Âü∫Á°ÄÁü•ËØÜ

Ê†àÂÖàËøõÂêéÂá∫ÔºåÊèê‰æõpush Âíå pop Á≠âÁ≠âÊé•Âè£ÔºåÊâÄÊúâÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂøÖÈ°ªÁ¨¶ÂêàÂÖàËøõÂêéÂá∫ËßÑÂàôÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Ê†à‰∏çÊèê‰æõËµ∞ËÆøÂäüËÉΩÔºå‰πü‰∏çÊèê‰æõËø≠‰ª£Âô®(iterator)„ÄÇ ‰∏çÂÉèÊòØset ÊàñËÄÖmap Êèê‰æõËø≠‰ª£Âô®iteratorÊù•ÈÅçÂéÜÊâÄÊúâÂÖÉÁ¥†„ÄÇ

Ê†àÊòØ‰ª•Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆπÂô®ÂÆåÊàêÂÖ∂ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÂ∑•‰ΩúÔºåÂØπÂ§ñÊèê‰æõÁªü‰∏ÄÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÔºåÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆπÂô®ÊòØÂèØÊèíÊãîÁöÑÔºà‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØËØ¥Êàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂‰ΩøÁî®Âì™ÁßçÂÆπÂô®Êù•ÂÆûÁé∞Ê†àÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÔºâ„ÄÇ

ÊâÄ‰ª•STL‰∏≠Ê†àÂæÄÂæÄ‰∏çË¢´ÂΩíÁ±ª‰∏∫ÂÆπÂô®ÔºåËÄåË¢´ÂΩíÁ±ª‰∏∫container adapterÔºàÂÆπÂô®ÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®Ôºâ„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πàÈóÆÈ¢òÊù•‰∫ÜÔºåSTL ‰∏≠Ê†àÊòØÁî®‰ªÄ‰πàÂÆπÂô®ÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÔºü

‰ªé‰∏ãÂõæ‰∏≠ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫ÔºåÊ†àÁöÑÂÜÖÈÉ®ÁªìÊûÑÔºåÊ†àÁöÑÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞ÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØvectorÔºådequeÔºålist ÈÉΩÊòØÂèØ‰ª•ÁöÑÔºå ‰∏ªË¶ÅÂ∞±ÊòØÊï∞ÁªÑÂíåÈìæË°®ÁöÑÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞„ÄÇ

Â∏∏Áî®ÁöÑSGI STLÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâÊåáÂÆöÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑËØùÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÊòØ‰ª•deque‰∏∫Áº∫ÁúÅÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÊ†àÁöÑ‰ΩéÂ±ÇÁªìÊûÑ„ÄÇ

dequeÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂèåÂêëÈòüÂàóÔºåÂè™Ë¶ÅÂ∞Å‰Ωè‰∏ÄÊÆµÔºåÂè™ÂºÄÈÄöÂè¶‰∏ÄÁ´ØÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞Ê†àÁöÑÈÄªËæë‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

SGI STL‰∏≠ ÈòüÂàóÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞Áº∫ÁúÅÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ã‰∏ÄÊ†∑‰ΩøÁî®dequeÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑ„ÄÇ

‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÊåáÂÆövector‰∏∫Ê†àÁöÑÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞ÔºåÂàùÂßãÂåñËØ≠Âè•Â¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

std::stack<int, std::vector<int> > third;  // ‰ΩøÁî®vector‰∏∫Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆπÂô®ÁöÑÊ†à

ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÈòüÂàóÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÁöÑ„ÄÇ

ÈòüÂàó‰∏≠ÂÖàËøõÂÖàÂá∫ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÔºåÂêåÊ†∑‰∏çÂÖÅËÆ∏ÊúâÈÅçÂéÜË°å‰∏∫Ôºå‰∏çÊèê‰æõËø≠‰ª£Âô®, SGI STL‰∏≠ÈòüÂàó‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÊòØ‰ª•deque‰∏∫Áº∫ÁúÅÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÁöÑÂ∫ïÈÉ®ÁªìÊûÑ„ÄÇ

‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÊåáÂÆölist ‰∏∫Ëµ∑Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞ÔºåÂàùÂßãÂåñqueueÁöÑËØ≠Âè•Â¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

std::queue<int, std::list<int>> third; // ÂÆö‰πâ‰ª•list‰∏∫Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆπÂô®ÁöÑÈòüÂàó

ÊâÄ‰ª•STL ÈòüÂàó‰πü‰∏çË¢´ÂΩíÁ±ª‰∏∫ÂÆπÂô®ÔºåËÄåË¢´ÂΩíÁ±ª‰∏∫container adapterÔºà ÂÆπÂô®ÈÄÇÈÖçÂô®Ôºâ„ÄÇ

Áî®Ê†àÊ®°ÊãüÂÆûÁé∞ÈòüÂàó

class MyQueue {public:    stack<int> stIn;    stack<int> stOut;    /** Initialize your data structure here. */    MyQueue() {    }    /** Push element x to the back of queue. */    void push(int x) {        stIn.push(x);    }    /** Removes the element from in front of queue and returns that element. */    int pop() {        // Âè™ÊúâÂΩìstOut‰∏∫Á©∫ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÂÜç‰ªéstInÈáåÂØºÂÖ•Êï∞ÊçÆÔºàÂØºÂÖ•stInÂÖ®ÈÉ®Êï∞ÊçÆÔºâ        if (stOut.empty()) {            // ‰ªéstInÂØºÂÖ•Êï∞ÊçÆÁõ¥Âà∞stIn‰∏∫Á©∫            while(!stIn.empty()) {                stOut.push(stIn.top());                stIn.pop();            }        }        int result = stOut.top();        stOut.pop();        return result;    }    /** Get the front element. */    int peek() {        int res = this->pop(); // Áõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®Â∑≤ÊúâÁöÑpopÂáΩÊï∞        stOut.push(res); // Âõ†‰∏∫popÂáΩÊï∞ÂºπÂá∫‰∫ÜÂÖÉÁ¥†resÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂÜçÊ∑ªÂä†ÂõûÂéª        return res;    }    /** Returns whether the queue is empty. */    bool empty() {        return stIn.empty() && stOut.empty();    }};

Áî®ÈòüÂàóÊ®°ÊãüÂÆûÁé∞Ê†à

class MyStack {public:    queue<int> que1;    queue<int> que2;    MyStack() {    }        void push(int x) {        que1.push(x);    }        int pop() {        if (!this->empty()) {            while (que1.size() > 1) {                que2.push(que1.front());                que1.pop();            }                        int result = que1.front();            que1.pop();            while (!que2.empty()) {                que1.push(que2.front());                que2.pop();            }            return result;        }        return 0;    }        int top() {        return que1.back();    }        bool empty() {        return que1.empty() && que2.empty();    }};/** * Your MyStack object will be instantiated and called as such: * MyStack* obj = new MyStack(); * obj->push(x); * int param_2 = obj->pop(); * int param_3 = obj->top(); * bool param_4 = obj->empty(); */

ÊúâÊïàÊã¨Âè∑ÈóÆÈ¢ò

class Solution {public:    bool isValid(string s) {        stack<char> sta;        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {            if (s[i] == '(') sta.push(')');            else if (s[i] == '[') sta.push(']');            else if (s[i] == '{') sta.push('}');            else if (sta.empty() || sta.top() != s[i]) return false;            else sta.pop();        }        return sta.empty();    } };

Êú¨ÁØá‰∏∫‰∏™‰∫∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜÖÂÆπÊàñÊúâÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
ÂõæÁâáÈÉ®ÂàÜÊ∫ê‰∫é‰ª£Á†ÅÈöèÊÉ≥ÂΩïÔºå‰æµÂà†„ÄÇ

‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤

Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÊòØËã•Âπ≤Â≠óÁ¨¶ÁªÑÊàêÁöÑÊúâÈôêÂ∫èÂàóÔºå‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÁêÜËß£‰∏∫ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶Êï∞ÁªÑÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂæàÂ§öËØ≠Ë®ÄÂØπÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂÅö‰∫ÜÁâπÊÆäÁöÑËßÑÂÆö„ÄÇ

Âú®CËØ≠Ë®Ä‰∏≠ÔºåÊää‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Â≠òÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™Êï∞ÁªÑÊó∂Ôºå‰πüÊääÁªìÊùüÁ¨¶ ‚Äò\0‚ÄôÂ≠òÂÖ•Êï∞ÁªÑÔºåÂπ∂‰ª•Ê≠§‰Ωú‰∏∫ËØ•Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÊòØÂê¶ÁªìÊùüÁöÑÊ†áÂøó„ÄÇ

‰æãÂ¶ÇËøôÊÆµ‰ª£Á†ÅÔºö

char a[5] = "asd";for (int i = 0; a[i] != '\0'; i++) {}

Âú®C++‰∏≠ÔºåÊèê‰æõ‰∏Ä‰∏™stringÁ±ªÔºåstringÁ±ª‰ºöÊèê‰æõ sizeÊé•Âè£ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Êù•Âà§Êñ≠stringÁ±ªÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÊòØÂê¶ÁªìÊùüÔºåÂ∞±‰∏çÁî®‚Äô\0‚ÄôÊù•Âà§Êñ≠ÊòØÂê¶ÁªìÊùü„ÄÇ

‰æãÂ¶ÇËøôÊÆµ‰ª£Á†Å:

string a = "asd";for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {}

ÈÇ£‰πàvector< char > Âíå string ÂèàÊúâ‰ªÄ‰πàÂå∫Âà´Âë¢Ôºü

ÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂú®Âü∫Êú¨Êìç‰Ωú‰∏äÊ≤°ÊúâÂå∫Âà´Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØ stringÊèê‰æõÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Â§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÁõ∏ÂÖ≥Êé•Âè£Ôºå‰æãÂ¶Çstring ÈáçËΩΩ‰∫Ü+ÔºåËÄåvectorÂç¥Ê≤°Êúâ„ÄÇ

ÊâÄ‰ª•ÊÉ≥Â§ÑÁêÜÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ËøòÊòØ‰ºöÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™stringÁ±ªÂûã„ÄÇ

ÂèåÊåáÈíàÊ≥ï

ÂèåÊåáÈíàÊ≥ïÂú®Êï∞ÁªÑÔºåÈìæË°®ÂíåÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏≠ÂæàÂ∏∏Áî®„ÄÇÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂæàÂ§öÊï∞ÁªÑÂ°´ÂÖÖÁ±ªÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÂÖàÈ¢ÑÂÖàÁªôÊï∞ÁªÑÊâ©ÂÆπÂ∏¶Â°´ÂÖÖÂêéÁöÑÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®‰ªéÂêéÂêëÂâçËøõË°åÊìç‰Ωú„ÄÇ

KMP

KMPÁöÑ‰∏ªË¶ÅÊÄùÊÉ≥ÊòØÂΩìÂá∫Áé∞Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏çÂåπÈÖçÊó∂ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Áü•ÈÅì‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜ‰πãÂâçÂ∑≤ÁªèÂåπÈÖçÁöÑÊñáÊú¨ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âà©Áî®Ëøô‰∫õ‰ø°ÊÅØÈÅøÂÖç‰ªéÂ§¥ÂÜçÂéªÂÅöÂåπÈÖç‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

KMPÁöÑÁ≤æÈ´ìÊâÄÂú®Â∞±ÊòØÂâçÁºÄË°®

ÂâçÁºÄË°®ÔºöËµ∑Âßã‰ΩçÁΩÆÂà∞‰∏ãÊ†ái‰πãÂâçÔºàÂåÖÊã¨iÔºâÁöÑÂ≠ê‰∏≤‰∏≠ÔºåÊúâÂ§öÂ§ßÈïøÂ∫¶ÁöÑÁõ∏ÂêåÂâçÁºÄÂêéÁºÄ„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πà‰ΩøÁî®KMPÂèØ‰ª•Ëß£ÂÜ≥‰∏§Á±ªÁªèÂÖ∏ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºö

  • ÂåπÈÖçÈóÆÈ¢òÔºö28. ÂÆûÁé∞ strStr()
  • ÈáçÂ§çÂ≠ê‰∏≤ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºö459.ÈáçÂ§çÁöÑÂ≠êÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤

ÂÜç‰∏ÄÊ¨°Âº∫Ë∞É‰∫Ü‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØÂâçÁºÄÔºå‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØÂêéÁºÄÔºå‰ªÄ‰πàÂèàÊòØÊúÄÈïøÁõ∏Á≠âÂâçÂêéÁºÄ„ÄÇ

ÂâçÁºÄÔºöÊåá‰∏çÂåÖÂê´ÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ‰ª•Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÂºÄÂ§¥ÁöÑËøûÁª≠Â≠ê‰∏≤„ÄÇ

ÂêéÁºÄÔºöÊåá‰∏çÂåÖÂê´Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ‰ª•ÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÁªìÂ∞æÁöÑËøûÁª≠Â≠ê‰∏≤„ÄÇ

ÁÑ∂ÂêéÈíàÂØπÂâçÁºÄË°®Âà∞Â∫ïË¶Å‰∏çË¶ÅÂáè‰∏ÄÔºåËøôÂÖ∂ÂÆûÊòØ‰∏çÂêåKMPÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÊñπÂºèÔºåÂú®KMPÁ≤æËÆ≤ ‰∏≠ÈíàÂØπ‰πãÂâç‰∏§‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÂàÜÂà´ÁªôÂá∫‰∫Ü‰∏§‰∏™‰∏çÂêåÁâàÊú¨ÁöÑÁöÑKMPÂÆûÁé∞„ÄÇ

ÂÖ∂‰∏≠‰∏ªË¶ÅÁêÜËß£j=next[x]Ëøô‰∏ÄÊ≠•ÊúÄ‰∏∫ÂÖ≥ÈîÆÔºÅ

entry.title: LeetCodeÁ¨îËÆ∞-KMP
entry.content:
ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

Êú¨ÁØá‰∏∫‰∏™‰∫∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜÖÂÆπÊàñÊúâÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
ÂõæÁâáÈÉ®ÂàÜÊ∫ê‰∫é‰ª£Á†ÅÈöèÊÉ≥ÂΩïÔºå‰æµÂà†„ÄÇ

Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Êìç‰Ωú‰∏ªË¶ÅËÄÉËôëÊ†ºÂºèÁöÑËΩ¨Êç¢„ÄÇ

ÂÆûÁé∞strStr()

LeetCodeÈ¢òÁõÆÈìæÊé•

KMPÁöÑÁªèÂÖ∏ÊÄùÊÉ≥Â∞±ÊòØ:ÂΩìÂá∫Áé∞Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏çÂåπÈÖçÊó∂ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜ‰πãÂâçÂ∑≤ÁªèÂåπÈÖçÁöÑÊñáÊú¨ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÂà©Áî®Ëøô‰∫õ‰ø°ÊÅØÈÅøÂÖç‰ªéÂ§¥ÂÜçÂéªÂÅöÂåπÈÖç„ÄÇ

KMPÁ≤æËÆ≤ÊñáÂ≠óÁâà

KMPÁ≤æËÆ≤ËßÜÈ¢ë

ÊëòË¶Å

ÊûÑÈÄ†nextÊï∞ÁªÑ

nextÊï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÊú¨Ë¥®Â∞±ÊòØÂâçÁºÄÂêéÁºÄÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰ΩçÊï∞Ë°®
ÂÆûÁé∞ÊñπÂºèÂ∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÊúâÂáè‰∏Ä„ÄÅÂè≥ÁßªÂíå‰øùÊåÅ‰∏çÂèò‰∏âÁßçÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÊú¨Ë¥®ÈÉΩÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÁöÑÔºåÂè™Âú®ÁªÜÂæÆÂú∞ÊñπÊúâÂå∫Âà´ÔºåÊú¨ÊñáÈááÁî®Âáè‰∏ÄÊñπÂºèÔºåÂÖ∂‰ªñÊñπÂºè‰ª£Á†ÅËØ¶ËßÅÂâçÁºÄË°®Ôºà‰∏çÂáè‰∏ÄÔºâC++ÂÆûÁé∞

Êàë‰ª¨ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞getNextÊù•ÊûÑÂª∫nextÊï∞ÁªÑÔºåÂáΩÊï∞ÂèÇÊï∞‰∏∫ÊåáÂêënextÊï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÊåáÈíàÔºåÂíå‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤„ÄÇ ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

void getNext(int* next, const string& s)

ÊûÑÈÄ†nextÊï∞ÁªÑÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂ∞±ÊòØËÆ°ÁÆóÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤sÔºåÂâçÁºÄË°®ÁöÑËøáÁ®ã„ÄÇ ‰∏ªË¶ÅÊúâÂ¶Ç‰∏ã‰∏âÊ≠•Ôºö

  1. ÂàùÂßãÂåñ
  2. Â§ÑÁêÜÂâçÂêéÁºÄ‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ
  3. Â§ÑÁêÜÂâçÂêéÁºÄÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ

Êé•‰∏ãÊù•Êàë‰ª¨ËØ¶Ëß£ËØ¶Ëß£‰∏Ä‰∏ã„ÄÇ

ÂàùÂßãÂåñÔºö
ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏§‰∏™ÊåáÈíàiÂíåjÔºåjÊåáÂêëÂâçÁºÄÊú´Â∞æ‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåiÊåáÂêëÂêéÁºÄÊú´Â∞æ‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ

ÁÑ∂ÂêéËøòË¶ÅÂØπnextÊï∞ÁªÑËøõË°åÂàùÂßãÂåñËµãÂÄºÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

int j = -1;next[0] = j;

j ‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàË¶ÅÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰∏∫ -1Âë¢ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫‰πãÂâçËØ¥Ëøá ÂâçÁºÄË°®Ë¶ÅÁªü‰∏ÄÂáè‰∏ÄÁöÑÊìç‰Ωú‰ªÖ‰ªÖÊòØÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁßçÂÆûÁé∞ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ËøôÈáåÈÄâÊã©jÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰∏∫-1Ôºå‰∏ãÊñáÊàëËøò‰ºöÁªôÂá∫j‰∏çÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰∏∫-1ÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞‰ª£Á†Å„ÄÇ

next[i] Ë°®Á§∫ iÔºàÂåÖÊã¨iÔºâ‰πãÂâçÊúÄÈïøÁõ∏Á≠âÁöÑÂâçÂêéÁºÄÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºàÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂ∞±ÊòØjÔºâ

ÊâÄ‰ª•ÂàùÂßãÂåñnext[0] = j „ÄÇ

Â§ÑÁêÜÂâçÂêéÁºÄ‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ
Âõ†‰∏∫jÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰∏∫-1ÔºåÈÇ£‰πàiÂ∞±‰ªé1ÂºÄÂßãÔºåËøõË°ås[i] ‰∏é s[j+1]ÁöÑÊØîËæÉ„ÄÇ

ÊâÄ‰ª•ÈÅçÂéÜÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤sÁöÑÂæ™ÁéØ‰∏ãÊ†ái Ë¶Å‰ªé 1ÂºÄÂßãÔºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

for (int i = 1; i < s.size(); i++) {

Â¶ÇÊûú s[i] ‰∏é s[j+1]‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÔºå‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØÈÅáÂà∞ ÂâçÂêéÁºÄÊú´Â∞æ‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµÔºåÂ∞±Ë¶ÅÂêëÂâçÂõûÈÄÄ„ÄÇ

ÊÄé‰πàÂõûÈÄÄÂë¢Ôºü

next[j]Â∞±ÊòØËÆ∞ÂΩïÁùÄjÔºàÂåÖÊã¨jÔºâ‰πãÂâçÁöÑÂ≠ê‰∏≤ÁöÑÁõ∏ÂêåÂâçÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πà s[i] ‰∏é s[j+1] ‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÔºåÂ∞±Ë¶ÅÊâæ j+1Ââç‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†Âú®nextÊï∞ÁªÑÈáåÁöÑÂÄºÔºàÂ∞±ÊòØnext[j]Ôºâ„ÄÇ

ÊâÄ‰ª•ÔºåÂ§ÑÁêÜÂâçÂêéÁºÄ‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

while (j >= 0 && s[i] != s[j + 1]) { // ÂâçÂêéÁºÄ‰∏çÁõ∏Âêå‰∫Ü    j = next[j]; // ÂêëÂâçÂõûÈÄÄ}

Â§ÑÁêÜÂâçÂêéÁºÄÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ
Â¶ÇÊûú s[i] ‰∏é s[j + 1] Áõ∏ÂêåÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±ÂêåÊó∂ÂêëÂêéÁßªÂä®i Âíåj ËØ¥ÊòéÊâæÂà∞‰∫ÜÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÂâçÂêéÁºÄÔºåÂêåÊó∂ËøòË¶ÅÂ∞ÜjÔºàÂâçÁºÄÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºâËµãÁªônext[i], Âõ†‰∏∫next[i]Ë¶ÅËÆ∞ÂΩïÁõ∏ÂêåÂâçÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶„ÄÇ

‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

if (s[i] == s[j + 1]) { // ÊâæÂà∞Áõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÂâçÂêéÁºÄ    j++;}next[i] = j;

ÊúÄÂêéÊï¥‰ΩìÊûÑÂª∫nextÊï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

void getNext(int* next, const string& s){    int j = -1;    next[0] = j;    for(int i = 1; i < s.size(); i++) { // Ê≥®ÊÑèi‰ªé1ÂºÄÂßã        while (j >= 0 && s[i] != s[j + 1]) { // ÂâçÂêéÁºÄ‰∏çÁõ∏Âêå‰∫Ü            j = next[j]; // ÂêëÂâçÂõûÈÄÄ        }        if (s[i] == s[j + 1]) { // ÊâæÂà∞Áõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÂâçÂêéÁºÄ            j++;        }        next[i] = j; // Â∞ÜjÔºàÂâçÁºÄÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºâËµãÁªônext[i]    }}

‰ª£Á†ÅÊûÑÈÄ†nextÊï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÈÄªËæëÊµÅÁ®ãÂä®ÁîªÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

ÂæóÂà∞‰∫ÜnextÊï∞ÁªÑ‰πãÂêéÔºåÂ∞±Ë¶ÅÁî®Ëøô‰∏™Êù•ÂÅöÂåπÈÖç‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

‰ΩøÁî®nextÊï∞ÁªÑÊù•ÂÅöÂåπÈÖç

Âú®ÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤sÈáå ÊâæÊòØÂê¶Âá∫Áé∞ËøáÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤t„ÄÇ

ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏§‰∏™‰∏ãÊ†áj ÊåáÂêëÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤Ëµ∑Âßã‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåiÊåáÂêëÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤Ëµ∑Âßã‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πàjÂàùÂßãÂÄº‰æùÁÑ∂‰∏∫-1Ôºå‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÂë¢Ôºü ‰æùÁÑ∂Âõ†‰∏∫nextÊï∞ÁªÑÈáåËÆ∞ÂΩïÁöÑËµ∑Âßã‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰∏∫-1„ÄÇ

iÂ∞±‰ªé0ÂºÄÂßãÔºåÈÅçÂéÜÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤Ôºå‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++)

Êé•‰∏ãÊù•Â∞±ÊòØ s[i] ‰∏é t[j + 1] ÔºàÂõ†‰∏∫j‰ªé-1ÂºÄÂßãÁöÑÔºâ ËøõË°åÊØîËæÉ„ÄÇ

Â¶ÇÊûú s[i] ‰∏é t[j + 1] ‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÔºåjÂ∞±Ë¶Å‰ªénextÊï∞ÁªÑÈáåÂØªÊâæ‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂåπÈÖçÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ

‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

while(j >= 0 && s[i] != t[j + 1]) {    j = next[j];}

Â¶ÇÊûú s[i] ‰∏é t[j + 1] Áõ∏ÂêåÔºåÈÇ£‰πài Âíå j ÂêåÊó∂ÂêëÂêéÁßªÂä®Ôºå ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

if (s[i] == t[j + 1]) {    j++; // iÁöÑÂ¢ûÂä†Âú®forÂæ™ÁéØÈáå}

Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂà§Êñ≠Âú®ÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤sÈáåÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤tÂë¢ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûújÊåáÂêë‰∫ÜÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤tÁöÑÊú´Â∞æÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±ËØ¥ÊòéÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤tÂÆåÂÖ®ÂåπÈÖçÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤sÈáåÁöÑÊüê‰∏™Â≠ê‰∏≤‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

Êú¨È¢òË¶ÅÂú®ÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏≠ÊâæÂá∫Ê®°Âºè‰∏≤Âá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆ (‰ªé0ÂºÄÂßã)ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÂú®ÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤ÂåπÈÖçÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤ÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆi ÂáèÂéª Ê®°Âºè‰∏≤ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºåÂ∞±ÊòØÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏≠Âá∫Áé∞Ê®°Âºè‰∏≤ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ

‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

if (j == (t.size() - 1) ) {    return (i - t.size() + 1);}

ÈÇ£‰πà‰ΩøÁî®nextÊï∞ÁªÑÔºåÁî®Ê®°Âºè‰∏≤ÂåπÈÖçÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤ÁöÑÊï¥‰Ωì‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

int j = -1; // Âõ†‰∏∫nextÊï∞ÁªÑÈáåËÆ∞ÂΩïÁöÑËµ∑Âßã‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰∏∫-1for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) { // Ê≥®ÊÑèiÂ∞±‰ªé0ÂºÄÂßã    while(j >= 0 && s[i] != t[j + 1]) { // ‰∏çÂåπÈÖç        j = next[j]; // j ÂØªÊâæ‰πãÂâçÂåπÈÖçÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ    }    if (s[i] == t[j + 1]) { // ÂåπÈÖçÔºåjÂíåiÂêåÊó∂ÂêëÂêéÁßªÂä®        j++; // iÁöÑÂ¢ûÂä†Âú®forÂæ™ÁéØÈáå    }    if (j == (t.size() - 1) ) { // ÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤sÈáåÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤t        return (i - t.size() + 1);    }}

Ê≠§Êó∂ÊâÄÊúâÈÄªËæëÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÈÉΩÂ∑≤ÁªèÂÜôÂá∫Êù•‰∫ÜÔºåÂäõÊâ£ 28.ÂÆûÁé∞strStr È¢òÁõÆÁöÑÊï¥‰Ωì‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

ÂâçÁºÄË°®Áªü‰∏ÄÂáè‰∏Ä C++‰ª£Á†ÅÂÆûÁé∞

class Solution {public:    void getNext(int* next, const string& s) {        int j = -1;        next[0] = j;        for(int i = 1; i < s.size(); i++) { // Ê≥®ÊÑèi‰ªé1ÂºÄÂßã            while (j >= 0 && s[i] != s[j + 1]) { // ÂâçÂêéÁºÄ‰∏çÁõ∏Âêå‰∫Ü                j = next[j]; // ÂêëÂâçÂõûÈÄÄ            }            if (s[i] == s[j + 1]) { // ÊâæÂà∞Áõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÂâçÂêéÁºÄ                j++;            }            next[i] = j; // Â∞ÜjÔºàÂâçÁºÄÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºâËµãÁªônext[i]        }    }    int strStr(string haystack, string needle) {        if (needle.size() == 0) {            return 0;        }        int next[needle.size()];        getNext(next, needle);        int j = -1; // // Âõ†‰∏∫nextÊï∞ÁªÑÈáåËÆ∞ÂΩïÁöÑËµ∑Âßã‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰∏∫-1        for (int i = 0; i < haystack.size(); i++) { // Ê≥®ÊÑèiÂ∞±‰ªé0ÂºÄÂßã            while(j >= 0 && haystack[i] != needle[j + 1]) { // ‰∏çÂåπÈÖç                j = next[j]; // j ÂØªÊâæ‰πãÂâçÂåπÈÖçÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ            }            if (haystack[i] == needle[j + 1]) { // ÂåπÈÖçÔºåjÂíåiÂêåÊó∂ÂêëÂêéÁßªÂä®                j++; // iÁöÑÂ¢ûÂä†Âú®forÂæ™ÁéØÈáå            }            if (j == (needle.size() - 1) ) { // ÊñáÊú¨‰∏≤sÈáåÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÊ®°Âºè‰∏≤t                return (i - needle.size() + 1);            }        }        return -1;    }};

entry.title: LeetCodeÁ¨îËÆ∞-ÂìàÂ∏åË°®
entry.content:
ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

Êú¨ÁØá‰∏∫‰∏™‰∫∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜÖÂÆπÊàñÊúâÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
ÂõæÁâáÈÉ®ÂàÜÊ∫ê‰∫é‰ª£Á†ÅÈöèÊÉ≥ÂΩïÔºå‰æµÂà†„ÄÇ

ÂìàÂ∏åË°®

ÂìàÂ∏åË°®ÊòØÊ†πÊçÆÂÖ≥ÈîÆÁ†ÅÁöÑÂÄºËÄåÁõ¥Êé•ËøõË°åËÆøÈóÆÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑ„ÄÇ
‰∏ÄËà¨ÂìàÂ∏åË°®ÈÉΩÊòØÁî®Êù•Âø´ÈÄüÂà§Êñ≠‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÊòØÂê¶Âá∫Áé∞Âú®ÈõÜÂêàÈáå„ÄÇ

ÂìàÂ∏åÁ¢∞Êíû

‰∏§‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂêåÊó∂Êò†Â∞ÑÂà∞ÂìàÂ∏åË°®‰∏≠Âêå‰∏Ä‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåËøô‰∏ÄÁé∞Ë±°Âè´ÂÅöÂìàÂ∏åÁ¢∞ÊíûÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ã‰æãÔºö

‰∏ÄËà¨Â§ÑÁêÜÊñπÊ≥ïÊúâ‰∏§ÁßçÔºåÊãâÈìæÊ≥ïÂíåÁ∫øÊÄßÊé¢ÊµãÊ≥ï„ÄÇ

ÊãâÈìæÊ≥ï


ÂÖ∂ÂÆûÊãâÈìæÊ≥ïÂ∞±ÊòØË¶ÅÈÄâÊã©ÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑÂìàÂ∏åË°®Â§ßÂ∞èÔºåËøôÊ†∑Êó¢‰∏ç‰ºöÂõ†‰∏∫Êï∞ÁªÑÁ©∫ÂÄºËÄåÊµ™Ë¥πÂ§ßÈáèÂÜÖÂ≠òÔºå‰πü‰∏ç‰ºöÂõ†‰∏∫ÈìæË°®Â§™ÈïøËÄåÂú®Êü•Êâæ‰∏äÊµ™Ë¥πÂ§™Â§öÊó∂Èó¥

Á∫øÊÄßÊé¢ÊµãÊ≥ï

‰ΩøÁî®Á∫øÊÄßÊé¢ÊµãÊ≥ïÔºå‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶Å‰øùËØÅtablesizeÂ§ß‰∫édatasizeÔºåÈúÄË¶Å‰æùÈù†ÂìàÂ∏åË°®‰∏≠ÁöÑÁ©∫‰ΩçÊù•Ëß£ÂÜ≥Á¢∞ÊíûÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ

Â∏∏ËßÅÁöÑ‰∏âÁßçÂìàÂ∏åÁªìÊûÑ

ÂΩìÊàë‰ª¨ÊÉ≥‰ΩøÁî®ÂìàÂ∏åÊ≥ïÊù•Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢òÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËà¨‰ºöÈÄâÊã©Â¶Ç‰∏ã‰∏âÁßçÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑ„ÄÇ

  • Êï∞ÁªÑ
  • set ÔºàÈõÜÂêàÔºâ
  • map(Êò†Â∞Ñ)

Âú®C++‰∏≠Ôºåset Âíå map ÂàÜÂà´Êèê‰æõ‰ª•‰∏ã‰∏âÁßçÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÔºåÂÖ∂Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞‰ª•Âèä‰ºòÂä£Â¶Ç‰∏ãË°®ÊâÄÁ§∫Ôºö

std::unordered_setÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞‰∏∫ÂìàÂ∏åË°®Ôºåstd::set Âíåstd::multiset ÁöÑÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞ÊòØÁ∫¢ÈªëÊ†ëÔºåÁ∫¢ÈªëÊ†ëÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÂπ≥Ë°°‰∫åÂèâÊêúÁ¥¢Ê†ëÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•keyÂÄºÊòØÊúâÂ∫èÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜkey‰∏çÂèØ‰ª•‰øÆÊîπÔºåÊîπÂä®keyÂÄº‰ºöÂØºËá¥Êï¥Ê£µÊ†ëÁöÑÈîô‰π±ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Âè™ËÉΩÂà†Èô§ÂíåÂ¢ûÂä†„ÄÇ

std::unordered_map Â∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞‰∏∫ÂìàÂ∏åË°®Ôºåstd::map Âíåstd::multimap ÁöÑÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÂÆûÁé∞ÊòØÁ∫¢ÈªëÊ†ë„ÄÇÂêåÁêÜÔºåstd::map Âíåstd::multimap ÁöÑkey‰πüÊòØÊúâÂ∫èÁöÑÔºàËøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢ò‰πüÁªèÂ∏∏‰Ωú‰∏∫Èù¢ËØïÈ¢òÔºåËÄÉÂØüÂØπËØ≠Ë®ÄÂÆπÂô®Â∫ïÂ±ÇÁöÑÁêÜËß£Ôºâ„ÄÇ

ÂΩìÊàë‰ª¨Ë¶Å‰ΩøÁî®ÈõÜÂêàÊù•Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÂìàÂ∏åÈóÆÈ¢òÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºå‰ºòÂÖà‰ΩøÁî®unordered_setÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫ÂÆÉÁöÑÊü•ËØ¢ÂíåÂ¢ûÂà†ÊïàÁéáÊòØÊúÄ‰ºòÁöÑÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÈúÄË¶ÅÈõÜÂêàÊòØÊúâÂ∫èÁöÑÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±Áî®setÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúË¶ÅÊ±Ç‰∏ç‰ªÖÊúâÂ∫èËøòË¶ÅÊúâÈáçÂ§çÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑËØùÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±Áî®multiset„ÄÇ

ÈÇ£‰πàÂÜçÊù•Áúã‰∏Ä‰∏ãmap ÔºåÂú®map ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™key value ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÔºåmap‰∏≠ÔºåÂØπkeyÊòØÊúâÈôêÂà∂ÔºåÂØπvalueÊ≤°ÊúâÈôêÂà∂ÁöÑÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫keyÁöÑÂ≠òÂÇ®ÊñπÂºè‰ΩøÁî®Á∫¢ÈªëÊ†ëÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑ„ÄÇ

‰∏âÁßçÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÁöÑÈÄâÊã©

  1. Êï∞ÊçÆÈáèÁªôÂÆöËÄå‰∏îÊ≤°ÊúâÂ§™Â§ßÈúÄÊ±ÇÁöÑÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•ÈÄâÊã©Êï∞ÁªÑ„ÄÇ
  2. Êï∞ÊçÆÈáèÊú™Áü•ËÄå‰∏îÂ¶ÇÊûúÂìàÂ∏åÂÄºÊØîËæÉÂ∞ë„ÄÅÁâπÂà´ÂàÜÊï£„ÄÅË∑®Â∫¶ÈùûÂ∏∏Â§ßÔºå‰ΩøÁî®setÔºå‰ΩøÁî®Êï∞ÁªÑÂ∞±ÈÄ†ÊàêÁ©∫Èó¥ÁöÑÊûÅÂ§ßÊµ™Ë¥π
  3. Áõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®set ‰∏ç‰ªÖÂç†Áî®Á©∫Èó¥ÊØîÊï∞ÁªÑÂ§ßÔºåËÄå‰∏îÈÄüÂ∫¶Ë¶ÅÊØîÊï∞ÁªÑÊÖ¢ÔºåsetÊääÊï∞ÂÄºÊò†Â∞ÑÂà∞key‰∏äÈÉΩË¶ÅÂÅöhashËÆ°ÁÆóÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Êï∞ÁªÑÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÈÄâÊã©Êï∞ÁªÑ
  4. mapÊòØÈááÁî®‰∫Ükey-valueÁöÑÊñπÂºèÔºå‰∏ÄËà¨ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Êù•‰øùÂ≠ò‰∏Ä‰∏ÄÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÈîÆÂÄºÂØπ

entry.title: LeetCodeÁ¨îËÆ∞-ÈìæË°®
entry.content:
ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

Êú¨ÁØá‰∏∫‰∏™‰∫∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜÖÂÆπÊàñÊúâÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
ÂõæÁâáÈÉ®ÂàÜÊ∫ê‰∫é‰ª£Á†ÅÈöèÊÉ≥ÂΩïÔºå‰æµÂà†„ÄÇ

ÈìæË°®

ÈìæË°®ÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÈÄöËøáÊåáÈíà‰∏≤ËÅîÂú®‰∏ÄËµ∑ÁöÑÁ∫øÊÄßÁªìÊûÑÔºåÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁî±‰∏§ÈÉ®ÂàÜÁªÑÊàêÔºå‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊòØÊï∞ÊçÆÂüü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊòØÊåáÈíàÂüüÔºàÂ≠òÊîæÊåáÂêë‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊåáÈíàÔºâÔºåÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊåáÈíàÂüüÊåáÂêënullÔºàÁ©∫ÊåáÈíàÁöÑÊÑèÊÄùÔºâ„ÄÇ

  1. ÈìæÊé•ÁöÑÂÖ•Âè£ËäÇÁÇπÁß∞‰∏∫ÈìæË°®ÁöÑÂ§¥ÁªìÁÇπ‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØhead„ÄÇ

  2. ÂèåÈìæË°®Ôºö

  3. Âæ™ÁéØÈìæË°®Ôºö
    Âæ™ÁéØÈìæË°®ÂèØÁî®Êù•Ëß£ÂÜ≥Á∫¶ÁëüÂ§´ÁéØÈóÆÈ¢ò

ÈìæË°®‰∏≠ÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÂú®ÂÜÖÂ≠ò‰∏≠‰∏çÊòØËøûÁª≠ÂàÜÂ∏ÉÁöÑ ÔºåËÄåÊòØÊï£‰π±ÂàÜÂ∏ÉÂú®ÂÜÖÂ≠ò‰∏≠ÁöÑÊüêÂú∞ÂùÄ‰∏äÔºåÂàÜÈÖçÊú∫Âà∂ÂèñÂÜ≥‰∫éÊìç‰ΩúÁ≥ªÁªüÁöÑÂÜÖÂ≠òÁÆ°ÁêÜ„ÄÇ

// ÂçïÈìæË°®struct ListNode {    int val;  // ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏äÂ≠òÂÇ®ÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†    ListNode *next;  // ÊåáÂêë‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊåáÈíà    // ListNode *prev;  //ÊåáÂêëÂâç‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥† ÂèåÈìæË°®ÔºåËÆ∞ÂæóÊûÑÈÄ†ÂáΩÊï∞ÂàùÂßãÂåñ    ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(NULL) {}  // ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊûÑÈÄ†ÂáΩÊï∞};

ÊÄßËÉΩÂàÜÊûê

ÊèíÂÖ•/Âà†Èô§Êü•ËØ¢ÈÄÇÁî®Âú∫ÊôØ
Êï∞ÁªÑO(n)O(1)Êï∞ÊçÆÈáèÂõ∫ÂÆöÔºåÈ¢ëÁπÅÊü•ËØ¢ÔºåËæÉÂ∞ëÂ¢ûÂà†
ÈìæË°®O(1)O(n)Êï∞ÊçÆÈáè‰∏çÂõ∫ÂÆöÔºåÈ¢ëÁπÅÂ¢ûÂà†ÔºåËæÉÂ∞ëÊü•ËØ¢

ÂçïÈìæË°®ÁöÑÂà†Èô§Êìç‰Ωú‰∏ÄËà¨Êúâ‰∏§Á±ªÔºö

  1. ËÆæÁΩÆËôöÊãüÂ§¥ÔºåÂ∞ÜÂ§¥ËäÇÁÇπÂΩì‰ΩúÊôÆÈÄöËäÇÁÇπÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÊúÄÂêéÂú®Âà†Èô§ËôöÊãüÂ§¥
  2. Â§¥ËäÇÁÇπÂíåÂÖ∂‰ªñËäÇÁÇπÂàÜÂºÄÂ§ÑÁêÜ

Pyhton„ÄÅJavaÁ≠âËØ≠Ë®ÄÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™Âä®ÈáäÊîæÂÜÖÂ≠òÔºåC++ËÆ∞ÂæóË¶ÅÊâãÂä®ÈáäÊîæÂÜÖÂ≠òËäÇÁ∫¶Á©∫Èó¥„ÄÇ

C++Á§∫‰æã

class MyLinkedList {public:    // ÂÆö‰πâÈìæË°®ËäÇÁÇπÁªìÊûÑ‰Ωì    struct LinkedNode {        int val;        LinkedNode* next;        LinkedNode(int val):val(val), next(nullptr){}    };    // ÂàùÂßãÂåñÈìæË°®    MyLinkedList() {        _dummyHead = new LinkedNode(0); // ËøôÈáåÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÂ§¥ÁªìÁÇπ ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ËôöÊãüÂ§¥ÁªìÁÇπÔºåËÄå‰∏çÊòØÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑÈìæË°®Â§¥ÁªìÁÇπ        _size = 0;    }    // Ëé∑ÂèñÂà∞Á¨¨index‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊï∞ÂÄºÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúindexÊòØÈùûÊ≥ïÊï∞ÂÄºÁõ¥Êé•ËøîÂõû-1Ôºå Ê≥®ÊÑèindexÊòØ‰ªé0ÂºÄÂßãÁöÑÔºåÁ¨¨0‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÂ∞±ÊòØÂ§¥ÁªìÁÇπ    int get(int index) {        if (index > (_size - 1) || index < 0) {            return -1;        }        LinkedNode* cur = _dummyHead->next;        while(index--){ // Â¶ÇÊûú--index Â∞±‰ºöÈô∑ÂÖ•Ê≠ªÂæ™ÁéØ            cur = cur->next;        }        return cur->val;    }    // Âú®ÈìæË°®ÊúÄÂâçÈù¢ÊèíÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÔºåÊèíÂÖ•ÂÆåÊàêÂêéÔºåÊñ∞ÊèíÂÖ•ÁöÑËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫ÈìæË°®ÁöÑÊñ∞ÁöÑÂ§¥ÁªìÁÇπ    void addAtHead(int val) {        LinkedNode* newNode = new LinkedNode(val);        newNode->next = _dummyHead->next;        _dummyHead->next = newNode;        _size++;    }    // Âú®ÈìæË°®ÊúÄÂêéÈù¢Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπ    void addAtTail(int val) {        LinkedNode* newNode = new LinkedNode(val);        LinkedNode* cur = _dummyHead;        while(cur->next != nullptr){            cur = cur->next;        }        cur->next = newNode;        _size++;    }    // Âú®Á¨¨index‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπ‰πãÂâçÊèíÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñ∞ËäÇÁÇπÔºå‰æãÂ¶Çindex‰∏∫0ÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊñ∞ÊèíÂÖ•ÁöÑËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫ÈìæË°®ÁöÑÊñ∞Â§¥ËäÇÁÇπ„ÄÇ    // Â¶ÇÊûúindex Á≠â‰∫éÈìæË°®ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºåÂàôËØ¥ÊòéÊòØÊñ∞ÊèíÂÖ•ÁöÑËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫ÈìæË°®ÁöÑÂ∞æÁªìÁÇπ    // Â¶ÇÊûúindexÂ§ß‰∫éÈìæË°®ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºåÂàôËøîÂõûÁ©∫    void addAtIndex(int index, int val) {        if (index > _size) {            return;        }        LinkedNode* newNode = new LinkedNode(val);        LinkedNode* cur = _dummyHead;        while(index--) {            cur = cur->next;        }        newNode->next = cur->next;        cur->next = newNode;        _size++;    }    // Âà†Èô§Á¨¨index‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúindex Â§ß‰∫éÁ≠â‰∫éÈìæË°®ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºåÁõ¥Êé•returnÔºåÊ≥®ÊÑèindexÊòØ‰ªé0ÂºÄÂßãÁöÑ    void deleteAtIndex(int index) {        if (index >= _size || index < 0) {            return;        }        LinkedNode* cur = _dummyHead;        while(index--) {            cur = cur ->next;        }        LinkedNode* tmp = cur->next;        cur->next = cur->next->next;        delete tmp;        _size--;    }    // ÊâìÂç∞ÈìæË°®    void printLinkedList() {        LinkedNode* cur = _dummyHead;        while (cur->next != nullptr) {            cout << cur->next->val << " ";            cur = cur->next;        }        cout << endl;    }private:    int _size;    LinkedNode* _dummyHead;};

ÂÖ≥‰∫éÁéØÂΩ¢ÈìæË°®ÂíåÂÖ•Âè£ÈóÆÈ¢ò

ÈìæË°®ÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú®ÁéØÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂèåÊåáÈíàÂø´ÈÄüÂà§ÂÆöÔºåfastÊØèÊ¨°ÁßªÂä®‰∏§‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÔºåslow‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁõ∏ÈÅáÔºàÂç≥fast == slowÔºâÔºåÂàôÂøÖÂÆöÂ≠òÂú®ÁéØ

MQTTClient(MQTT_CLIENT_ID, MQTT_SERVER, MQTT_PORT,MQTT_USER_NAME, MQTTT_PASSWORD, 60)    mqtt_client.set_callback(mqtt_callback)    mqtt_client.connect()def mqtt_report(client, color, name, switch, brightness/100.0)    # ËØ•Âæ™ÁéØ‰∏∫ÊµãËØïLEDÁ≠âÁöÑÂºÄÈó≠Âæ™ÁéØ    # while True:    #     relay.set_on()    #     await uasyncio.sleep_ms(2000)    #     relay.set_off()    #     await relay.set_state(LED_status)            switch_status_last = switch_status        if light_changed:            light_changed = False            led.rgb_light(255 if color==0 else 0, 255 if color==1 else 0, 255 if color==2 else 0, brightness/100.0)        # Ë∞ÉÊï¥‰∏∫0.02*100=2Áßí‰∏äÊä•‰∏ÄÊ¨°        if time_cnt >= 100:            mqtt_report(mqtt_client, color, name, LED_status, brightness)            time_cnt = 0        time_cnt = time_cnt+1        await uasyncio.sleep_ms(20)# # Relay.pyfrom machine import ADCfrom machine import Pin, Signalclass Relay():    def __init__(self, pin):        self.relaypin = Pin(pin, Pin.OUT)        self.relayled = Signal(self.relaypin, invert=True) # Â∞Ü‰ø°Âè∑ÁΩÆÂèç, ÂÆûÁé∞ÂºÄ‰∏éÂÖ≥ÂíåËæìÂÖ•‰ø°Âè∑ÂØπÂ∫î        #self.last_status = 1    def set_state(self, state):        self.relayled.value(state)        #self.relaypin.value(state)        #self.last_status = state    def set_on(self):        #self.relaypin.on() value: 1 but light is off        self.relayled.value(1)        print('Relay on value: ' + str(self.relayled.value()))        def set_off(self):        # self.relaypin.off() value: 0 but light is on        self.relayled.value(0)        print('Relay off value: ' + str(self.relayled.value()))        def state(self):        return self.relayled.value()
#LED.pyfrom machine import PWMfrom machine import Pinclass Led():    """    ÂàõÂª∫LEDÁ±ª    """    def __init__(self, rpin, gpin, bpin, sfreq=1000):        """        ÊûÑÈÄ†ÂáΩÊï∞        :param pin: Êé•LEDÁöÑÁÆ°ËÑöÔºåÂøÖÈ°ªÊîØÊåÅPWM        :param freq: PWMÁöÑÈªòËÆ§È¢ëÁéáÊòØ1000        """        #‰ª•rpin, gpin, bpin‰∏∫ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºå‰ΩøÁî®PinÂíåPWMÊù•ÁªëÂÆö‰∏â‰∏™ÂºïËÑöÊù•ÊéßÂà∂ledÁÅØÁöÑÁ∫¢ÈªÑËìùÁöÑ‰∏â‰∏™PWM‰ø°Âè∑        self.led_red = PWM(Pin(rpin), freq = sfreq)        self.led_green = PWM(Pin(gpin), freq = sfreq)        self.led_blue = PWM(Pin(bpin), freq = sfreq)            def rgb_light(self, red, green, blue, brightness):        #red green blueÁöÑËåÉÂõ¥Âú®range(256)ÂÜÖÔºåbrightnessÁöÑËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[0,1]ÂÜÖÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂèñÂÄº‰∏çÂú®Ê≠£Á°ÆËåÉÂõ¥ÂÜÖÔºå‰ªÄ‰πà‰πü‰∏çÂÅö        #Ë∞ÉÁî®dutyÊàêÂëòÂáΩÊï∞Êù•ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏âÁßçÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑÂç†Á©∫ÊØî        if brightness >= 0 and brightness <= 1:            if red in range(256):                self.led_red.duty(int(red/255*brightness*1023))            if green in range(256):                self.led_green.duty(int(green/255*brightness*1023))            if blue in range(256):                self.led_blue.duty(int(blue/255*brightness*1023))            def deinit(self):        """        ÊûêÊûÑÂáΩÊï∞        """        self.led_red.deinit()        self.led_green.deinit()        self.led_blue.deinit()
# Button.pyfrom machine import ADC from machine import Pinclass Button():        def __init__(self, pin):        self.button = Pin(pin, Pin.IN)    def state(self):        return self.button.value()

# main.pyfrom ble_lightsensor import BLELightSensorfrom lightsensor import LightSensorimport timeimport bluetoothdef main():    ble = bluetooth.BLE()    ble.active(True)    ble_light = BLELightSensor(ble)    light = LightSensor(36)    light_density = light.value()    i = 0    while True:        # Write every second, notify every 10 seconds.        i = (i + 1) % 10        ble_light.set_light(light_density, notify=i == 0)        print("Light Lux:", light_density)        light_density = light.value()        time.sleep_ms(1000)if __name__ == "__main__":    main()
# ble_advertising.py# Helpers for generating BLE advertising payloads.from micropython import constimport structimport bluetooth# Advertising payloads are repeated packets of the following form:#   1 byte data length (N + 1)#   1 byte type (see constants below)#   N bytes type-specific data_ADV_TYPE_FLAGS = const(0x01)_ADV_TYPE_NAME = const(0x09)_ADV_TYPE_UUID16_COMPLETE = const(0x3)_ADV_TYPE_UUID32_COMPLETE = const(0x5)_ADV_TYPE_UUID128_COMPLETE = const(0x7)_ADV_TYPE_UUID16_MORE = const(0x2)_ADV_TYPE_UUID32_MORE = const(0x4)_ADV_TYPE_UUID128_MORE = const(0x6)_ADV_TYPE_APPEARANCE = const(0x19)_ADV_TYPE_SERVICE_DATA = const(0x16)# Generate a payload to be passed to gap_advertise(adv_data=...).def advertising_payload(limited_disc=False, br_edr=False, name=None, services=None, appearance=0, service_data = None):    payload = bytearray()    def _append(adv_type, value):        nonlocal payload        payload += struct.pack("BB", len(value) + 1, adv_type) + value    _append(        _ADV_TYPE_FLAGS,        struct.pack("B", (0x01 if limited_disc else 0x02) + (0x18 if br_edr else 0x04)),    )    if name:        _append(_ADV_TYPE_NAME, name)    if services:        for uuid in services:            b = bytes(uuid)            if len(b) == 2:                _append(_ADV_TYPE_UUID16_COMPLETE, b)            elif len(b) == 4:                _append(_ADV_TYPE_UUID32_COMPLETE, b)            elif len(b) == 16:                _append(_ADV_TYPE_UUID128_COMPLETE, b)    # See org.bluetooth.characteristic.gap.appearance.xml    if appearance:        _append(_ADV_TYPE_APPEARANCE, struct.pack("<h", appearance))    if service_data:        _append(_ADV_TYPE_SERVICE_DATA, service_data)    return payloaddef decode_field(payload, adv_type):    i = 0    result = []    while i + 1 < len(payload):        if payload[i + 1] == adv_type:            result.append(payload[i + 2 : i + payload[i] + 1])        i += 1 + payload[i]    return resultdef decode_name(payload):    n = decode_field(payload, _ADV_TYPE_NAME)    return str(n[0], "utf-8") if n else ""def decode_services(payload):    services = []    for u in decode_field(payload, _ADV_TYPE_UUID16_COMPLETE):        services.append(bluetooth.UUID(struct.unpack("<h", u)[0]))    for u in decode_field(payload, _ADV_TYPE_UUID32_COMPLETE):        services.append(bluetooth.UUID(struct.unpack("<d", u)[0]))    for u in decode_field(payload, _ADV_TYPE_UUID128_COMPLETE):        services.append(bluetooth.UUID(u))    return servicesdef demo():    payload = advertising_payload(        name="micropython",        services=[bluetooth.UUID(0x181A), bluetooth.UUID("6E400001-B5A3-F393-E0A9-E50E24DCCA9E")],    )    print(payload)    print(decode_name(payload))    print(decode_services(payload))if __name__ == "__main__":    demo()
# ble_lightsensor.pyimport bluetoothimport structimport timefrom ble_advertising import advertising_payloadfrom micropython import const_IRQ_CENTRAL_CONNECT = const(1)_IRQ_CENTRAL_DISCONNECT = const(2)_IRQ_GATTS_INDICATE_DONE = const(20)_FLAG_READ = const(0x0002)_FLAG_NOTIFY = const(0x0010)_ADV_SERVICE_DATA_UUID = 0xFE95_SERVICE_UUID_ENV_SENSE = 0x181A_CHAR_UUID_AMBIENT_LIGHT = 'FEC66B35-937E-4938-9F8D-6E44BBD533EE'# Service environmental sensing_ENV_SENSE_UUID = bluetooth.UUID(_SERVICE_UUID_ENV_SENSE)# Characteristic ambient light density_AMBIENT_LIGHT_CHAR = (    bluetooth.UUID(_CHAR_UUID_AMBIENT_LIGHT),    _FLAG_READ | _FLAG_NOTIFY ,)_ENV_SENSE_SERVICE = (    _ENV_SENSE_UUID,    (_AMBIENT_LIGHT_CHAR,),)# https://specificationrefs.bluetooth.com/assigned-values/Appearance%20Values.pdf_ADV_APPEARANCE_GENERIC_AMBIENT_LIGHT = const(1344)class BLELightSensor:    def __init__(self, ble, name='Nodemcu'):        self._ble = ble        self._ble.active(True)        self._ble.irq(self._irq)        ((self._handle,),) = self._ble.gatts_register_services((_ENV_SENSE_SERVICE,))        self._connections = set()        time.sleep_ms(500)        self._payload = advertising_payload(            name=name, services=[_ENV_SENSE_UUID], appearance=_ADV_APPEARANCE_GENERIC_AMBIENT_LIGHT        )        self._sd_adv = None        self._advertise()    def _irq(self, event, data):        # Track connections so we can send notifications.        if event == _IRQ_CENTRAL_CONNECT:            conn_handle, _, _ = data            self._connections.add(conn_handle)        elif event == _IRQ_CENTRAL_DISCONNECT:            conn_handle, _, _ = data            self._connections.remove(conn_handle)            # Start advertising again to allow a new connection.            self._advertise()        elif event == _IRQ_GATTS_INDICATE_DONE:            conn_handle, value_handle, status = data    def set_light(self, light_den, notify=False):        self._ble.gatts_write(self._handle, struct.pack("!h", int(light_den)))        self._sd_adv = self.build_mi_sdadv(light_den)        self._advertise()        if notify:            for conn_handle in self._connections:                if notify:                    # Notify connected centrals.                    self._ble.gatts_notify(conn_handle, self._handle)    def build_mi_sdadv(self, density):                uuid = 0xFE95        fc = 0x0010        pid = 0x0002        fcnt = 0x01        mac = self._ble.config('mac')        objid = 0x1007        objlen = 0x03        objval = density        #service_data = struct.pack("<3HB",uuid,fc,pid,fcnt)+mac+struct.pack("<H2BH",objid,objlen,0,objval)        #macËé∑ÂèñÂæóÂà∞ÁöÑÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™tupleÂØπË±° ex: (0, b'4\\x86]\\xb6\\xeb\\x0e'), ÂèñÁ¨¨‰∫å‰∏™        service_data = struct.pack("<3HB",uuid,fc,pid,fcnt)+mac[1]+struct.pack("<H2BH",objid,objlen,0,objval)        print("Service Data:",service_data)                return advertising_payload(service_data=service_data)            def _advertise(self, interval_us=500000):        self._ble.gap_advertise(interval_us, adv_data=self._payload)        time.sleep_ms(100)        print("sd_adv",self._sd_adv)        if self._sd_adv is not None:            print("sdddd_adv",self._sd_adv)            self._ble.gap_advertise(interval_us, adv_data=self._sd_adv)
# lightsensor.pyfrom machine import ADCfrom machine import Pinclass LightSensor():    def __init__(self, pin):        self.light = ADC(Pin(pin))    def value(self):        value = self.light.read()        print("Light ADC value:",value)        return int(value / 4095 * 6000)

# blescan.pyimport timefrom threading import Threadfrom interruptingcow import timeoutfrom bluepy.btle import DefaultDelegate, Peripheral, Scanner, UUID, capitaliseName, BTLEInternalErrorfrom bluepy.btle import BTLEDisconnectError, BTLEManagementError, BTLEGattErrorclass LightScanner():    SCAN_TIMEOUT = 5    def __init__(self, name):        self._name = name        def status_update(self):        results = self._get_data()        # messages = [        #     MqttMessage(        #         topic=self.format_topic("property/light"),        #         payload=results.lightlevel,        #     )        # ]        return results    def _get_data(self):        """        Ëé∑ÂèñÂÖâÁÖßÂº∫Â∫¶Êï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂπ∂ÂØπË∂ÖÊó∂ÂºÇÂ∏∏ËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜ        """        scan_processor = ScanProcessor(self._name)        scanner = Scanner().withDelegate(scan_processor)        scanner.scan(self.SCAN_TIMEOUT, passive=True)        with timeout(            self.SCAN_TIMEOUT,            exception=Exception(                "Retrieving data from {} device {} timed out after {} seconds".format(                    repr(self), self._name, self.SCAN_TIMEOUT                )            ),        ):            while not scan_processor.ready:                time.sleep(1)            return scan_processor.results        return scan_processor.resultsclass ScanProcessor:    ADV_TYPE_SERVICE_DATA = 0x16 #ËÆæÁΩÆÊï∞ÊçÆÊ†ºÂºè‰∏∫ÂçÅÂÖ≠ËøõÂà∂    def __init__(self, name):        self._ready = False        self._name = name        self._results = MiBeaconData()    def handleDiscovery(self, dev, isNewDev, _):        is_nodemcu = False        if isNewDev:            for (adtype, desc, value) in dev.getScanData():                #Service Data UUID == 0xFE95 according to MiBeacon                if adtype == self.ADV_TYPE_SERVICE_DATA and value.startswith("95fe"):                    print("FOUND service Data:",adtype, desc, value)                    #Object ID == 0x1007 according to MiBeacon                    if len(value) == 38 and value[26:30] == '0710':                        light_den = int((value[-2:] + value[-4:-2]), 16)                        mac = value[14:26]                        self._results.lightlevel = light_den                        self._results.mac = mac                        self.ready = True    @property    def mac(self):        return self._mac    @property    def ready(self):        return self._ready    @ready.setter    def ready(self, var):        self._ready = var    @property    def results(self):        return self._resultsclass MiBeaconData:    def __init__(self):        self._lightlevel = None        self._mac = None    @property    def lightlevel(self):        return self._lightlevel    @lightlevel.setter    def lightlevel(self, var):        self._lightlevel = var    @property    def mac(self):        return self._mac    @mac.setter    def mac(self, var):        self._mac = var
# gateway.pyfrom blescan import LightScanner, MiBeaconDataimport time import asyncioimport jsonimport uuidimport paho.mqtt.client as MQTTClient"""QCloud Device Info"""DEVICE_NAME = "Lightsensor_1"PRODUCT_ID = "X2OQT7NRTP"DEVICE_KEY = "h0ftJ153maTi6jJWg9KCQA==""""MQTT topic"""MQTT_CONTROL_TOPIC = "$thing/down/property/"+PRODUCT_ID+"/"+DEVICE_NAMEMQTT_CONTROL_REPLY_TOPIC = "$thing/up/property/"+PRODUCT_ID+"/"+DEVICE_NAMEdef mqtt_callback(client, userdata, msg):    # Callback    # print(f"Received `{msg.payload.decode()}` from `{msg.topic}` topic")    returnasync def mqtt_connect():    #connect callback    def on_connect(client, userdata, flags, rc):        if rc == 0:            print("Connected to MQTT Broker!")        else:            print("Failed to connect, return code %d\n", rc)    mqtt_client = None    MQTT_SERVER = PRODUCT_ID + ".iotcloud.tencentdevices.com"    MQTT_PORT = 1883    MQTT_CLIENT_ID = PRODUCT_ID+DEVICE_NAME    MQTT_USER_NAME = "X2OQT7NRTPLightsensor_1;12010126;DTXFZ;1655263739"    MQTTT_PASSWORD = "c02c6980d125f3846de11e1ab1d256f864e78f7377d2d4f94d992c5703a056c1;hmacsha256"    mqtt_client = MQTTClient.Client(MQTT_CLIENT_ID)    mqtt_client.username_pw_set(MQTT_USER_NAME, MQTTT_PASSWORD)    mqtt_client.on_connect = on_connect        mqtt_client.connect(MQTT_SERVER, MQTT_PORT, 60)    return mqtt_clientdef mqtt_report(client, light_level):    client_token = "clientToken-" + str(uuid.uuid4())    msg = {        "method": "report",        "clientToken": client_token,        "params": {            "Illuminance": light_level        }    }    client.publish(MQTT_CONTROL_REPLY_TOPIC, json.dumps(msg))async def light_loop(mclient):    bles = LightScanner('Nodemcu')    mclient.subscribe(MQTT_CONTROL_TOPIC)    mclient.on_message = mqtt_callback    mclient.loop_start()    while True:        try:            #Ë∞ÉÁî®blesÊàêÂëòÂáΩÊï∞ËØªÂèñÊâ´ÊèèÂà∞ÁöÑÂÖâÁÖßÂº∫Â∫¶Êï∞ÂÄº            data = bles._get_data()        except Exception as e:            print("BLE SCAN error:", e)            continue        #‰∏ä‰º†Êâ´ÊèèÂà∞ÁöÑÂÖâÁÖßÂº∫Â∫¶Êï∞ÂÄº        mqtt_report(mclient, data)                await time.sleep(0.3)async def main():    mqtt_client = None    # MQTT connection    try:        mqtt_client = await asyncio.wait_for(mqtt_connect(), 20)    except asyncio.TimeoutError:        print("mqtt connected timeout!")    if mqtt_client is not None:        await asyncio.gather(light_loop(mqtt_client))asyncio.get_event_loop().run_until_complete(main())

ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

Âú®C++‰∏≠string„ÄÅconst char„ÄÅ char „ÄÅchar[]ÂõõËÄÖÁ±ªÂûãÁªèÂ∏∏‰ºöÈúÄË¶ÅËΩ¨Âåñ„ÄÇ

ËΩ¨ÂåñÊñπÊ≥ï

  1. char*ËΩ¨stringÔºöÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•ËµãÂÄº„ÄÇ
  2. char[]ËΩ¨stringÔºöÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•ËµãÂÄº„ÄÇ
  3. char*ËΩ¨char[]Ôºö‰∏çËÉΩÁõ¥Êé•ËµãÂÄºÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âæ™ÁéØchar*Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÈÄê‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ËµãÂÄº,‰πüÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®strcpy_sÁ≠âÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇ
  4. stringËΩ¨char[]:‰∏çËÉΩÁõ¥Êé•ËµãÂÄºÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âæ™ÁéØchar*Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÈÄê‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ËµãÂÄº,‰πüÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®strcpy_sÁ≠âÂáΩÊï∞
  5. stringËΩ¨char*:Ë∞ÉÁî®stringÂØπË±°ÁöÑc_strÂáΩÊï∞ÊàñdataÂáΩÊï∞ÊàñcopyÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇ
  6. char[]ËΩ¨char*:Áõ¥Êé•ËµãÂÄºÂç≥ÂèØ„ÄÇ
    ‰ΩøÁî®Êó∂ÔºåË¶ÅÂØπÊ∫êÊ†ºÂºèÂíåÁõÆÊ†áÊ†ºÂºèËøõË°åÂàùÂßãÂåñ„ÄÇÊ∫êÊ†ºÂºèËµãÂÄº‰∏∫ÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÁõÆÊ†áÊ†ºÂºèËµãÂÄº‰∏∫Á©∫„ÄÇ

ÊÄªÁªìÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö
A. ÂèòÊàêstring,Áõ¥Êé•ËµãÂÄº„ÄÇ

D. stringÂèòchar*Ë¶ÅÈÄöËøáconst char*‰∏≠ËΩ¨„ÄÇ
E. ÂèòÊàêchar[]„ÄÇstringÈÄê‰∏™ËµãÂÄºÔºåchar* const char* strncpy_s()

CÂíåC++‰∏≠charÂíåstringÂå∫Âà´

Âú®CËØ≠Ë®Ä‰∏≠Ôºåstring ÊòØÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÔºåÂ≠òÂÇ®ÁöÑÊòØ‰∏ÄÊÆµÂ¶Ç‚Äúabcd‚ÄùÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåËÄå‰∏îÊúÄÂêéËøòÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁªìÊùüÁ¨¶‚Äô\0‚Äô;

char ÊòØÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÔºåÂ≠òÂÇ®‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÔºåÂç†‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óËäÇ„ÄÇ

Âú®C++‰∏≠ÔºåstringÊúâ‰∏§ÁßçÔºå‰∏ÄÁßçÊòØÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤char[]ÔºåÂè¶Â§ñ‰∏ÄÁßçÊòØÂ∞ÅË£ÖÂ•ΩÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Á±ªÔºåË¶ÅÂå∫Âà´ÁêÜËß£„ÄÇ‰æãÂ¶Ç‚Äôa‚ÄôÊòØchar, ‚Äúa‚ÄùÊòØchar stringÔºåËøô‰∏§ËÄÖÈÉΩÊòØÊôÆÈÄöÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶ÂíåÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÔºåÂíåCËØ≠Ë®Ä‰∏≠Ê≤°‰ªÄ‰πà‰∏çÂêåÂÄºÂæóÊ≥®ÊÑèÁöÑÊòØÂêéËÄÖÂåÖÂê´‰∏§‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶ÔºåÊú´Â∞æÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈöêË∫´ÁöÑ‚Äô\0‚Äô

ËÄå string str = ‚Äúa‚Äù ÊòØC++ Â∞ÅË£ÖÂ•ΩÁöÑstring„ÄÇC++‰∏≠ÁöÑchar stringÂíåstring‰∏çÊòØ‰∏ÄÂõû‰∫ã„ÄÇÂΩìÁî®Âà∞‰∫Ü‚Äùstring‚ÄùËøô‰∏™ÂÖ≥ÈîÆËØçÔºåÂ∞±‰∏çÊòØÊôÆÈÄöÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÔºåËÄåÊòØÁî®Âà∞‰∫ÜÂ∞ÅË£ÖÂêéÁöÑÁ±ª„ÄÇ
Âú®C++‰∏≠Ôºåchar‰ªçÁÑ∂ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™primitive typeÔºàÂéüÂßãÁ±ªÂûãÔºâÔºåËÄåstringÂ∑≤ÁªèÁªèËøáÂ∞ÅË£ÖÔºåÊàê‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™classÔºàÁ±ªÔºâÁî®Âà∞ÂÆÉÊó∂ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÈúÄË¶Å #include ÔºåÂÆÉÊòØC++ Standard Library ÔºàC++Ê†áÂáÜÂ∫ìÔºâÁöÑ‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜ„ÄÇ

ÂèÇËÄÉÔºö

entry.title: Âà©Áî®RSAÂä†ÂØÜÁÆóÊ≥ïÂíåMD5ÂìàÂ∏åÁÆóÊ≥ïÂÆûÁé∞Âä†ÂØÜÈÄö‰ø°ÔºàC++Ôºâ
entry.content:
ÊëòË¶ÅÂæÖË°•ÂÖÖ

Êú¨ÁØá‰∏∫‰ΩúËÄÖ‰∏™‰∫∫‰Ωú‰∏öÔºå‰ªÖ‰æõÂèÇËÄÉÔºåËΩ¨ËΩΩËØ∑Ê≥®ÊòéÂá∫Â§Ñ

ÂÆûÈ™åÁõÆÁöÑ

Âú®‰øùÂØÜÈÄö‰ø°ËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÔºåÂØπÊ∂àÊÅØÂÆåÊï¥ÊÄßÁöÑÊ£ÄÈ™åÂíåÂØπÊ∂àÊÅØÊù•Ê∫êÁöÑËÆ§ËØÅÔºåÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÂ∏∏ÈáçË¶ÅÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÊú¨Ê¨°Â§ß‰Ωú‰∏öÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ‰∏∫Ôºö

ËÆæËÆ°‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂçèËÆÆÔºåÂà©Áî®rsaÂÖ¨Èí•Âä†ÂØÜÁÆóÊ≥ïÂíåMD5ÂìàÂ∏åÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºåÂÆûÁé∞ÂØπÊ∂àÊÅØÁöÑÂÆåÊï¥ÊÄßÊ£ÄÈ™åÂíåÂèëÈÄÅËÄÖË∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂπ∂ÁºñÁ®ãÂÆûÁé∞Ëøô‰∏™ÂçèËÆÆ„ÄÇÁ®ãÂ∫èÁöÑË¶ÅÊ±ÇÊòØÂÅáËÆæÈÄöËÆØÂèåÊñπ‰∏∫AÂíåBÔºåÂπ∂ÂÅáËÆæÂèëÊñπÊã•ÊúâËá™Â∑±ÁöÑRSAÂÖ¨Èí•PKAÂíåÁßÅÈí•SKA ÔºåÂêåÊó∂Êî∂ÊñπBÂ∑≤ÁªèÈÄöËøáÊüêÁßçÊñπÂºèÁü•ÈÅì‰∫ÜÂèëÊñπÁöÑÂÖ¨Èí•PKA „ÄÇÂçèËÆÆË¶ÅÊ±ÇÂØπÂèëÊñπAÂèëÊù•ÁöÑÊ∂àÊÅØÔºåÊî∂ÊñπBÈÄöËøáÊ£ÄÈ™åÔºåËÉΩÂ§üÁ°ÆÂÆöÔºö

  1. BÊî∂Âà∞ÁöÑÊ∂àÊÅØÊòØÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑÔºåÂç≥Ê∂àÊÅØÂú®‰º†ÈÄÅËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠Ê≤°ÊúâÈÅ≠Âà∞ÈùûÊ≥ï‰øÆÊîπÔºõ
  2. BÊî∂Âà∞ÁöÑÊ∂àÊÅØÊù•Ê∫êÊòØÁúüÂÆûÁöÑÔºåÂç≥ËØ•Ê∂àÊÅØÁöÑÁ°ÆÊòØÁî±AÂèëÊù•ÁöÑÔºåËÄå‰∏çÊòØÁî±ÂÖ∂‰ªñ‰∫∫‰º™ÈÄ†ÁöÑ„ÄÇ

ÂÆûÈ™åË¶ÅÊ±Ç

  1. ÂàÜÂà´ÁºñÂÜô‰∏§‰∏™Á®ãÂ∫èÔºå‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏∫ÂèëÊñπÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºå‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏∫Êî∂ÊñπÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºåÂÜôÊ∏ÖÊ•ö‰∏§‰∏™Á®ãÂ∫èÂàÜÂà´Ë¶ÅÂÆåÊàêÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂπ∂ËÉΩÂ§üÂú®‰∏§‰∏™Á®ãÂ∫èÈó¥ËøõË°åÈÄöËÆØ„ÄÇ
  2. Â§ß‰Ωú‰∏öÁöÑÊèê‰∫§ÊñπÂºèÂêåÂÆûÈ™åÊä•ÂëäÁöÑÊèê‰∫§Ôºå‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØËØ¥Êó¢Ë¶ÅÊèê‰∫§Á®ãÂ∫èÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑËØ¥ÊòéÊñáÊ°£Ôºå‰πüË¶ÅÊèê‰∫§Ê∫ê‰ª£Á†ÅÂíåÂèØÊâßË°åÁ®ãÂ∫è„ÄÇ

ËÆæËÆ°ÊÄùË∑Ø

RSAÂÖ¨Èí•Âä†ÂØÜÁÆóÊ≥ïÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞ÂØπÊ∂àÊÅØÁöÑÂä†ÂØÜÂíåËß£ÂØÜÔºåËÄåMD5‰ªÖÂèØÂØπÊ∂àÊÅØËøõË°åÂä†ÂØÜÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºå‰∏îÂú®‰πãÂâçÁöÑÂÆûÈ™å‰∏≠ÁªèËøáÊµãËØïÂùáÊª°Ë∂≥Èõ™Â¥©ÊïàÂ∫îÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§ÂàùÊ≠•ÊÄùË∑ØÊòØÔºö

  1. Âà©Áî®MD5ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂÆûÁé∞ÂØπÂèëÈÄÅÊñπÂíåÊé•Êî∂ÊñπÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩÁ°ÆËÆ§
    • ÂèåÊñπÂùáÁü•ÈÅìÂØπÊñπË∫´‰ªΩÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§ÂèØ‰ª•ÂèëÈÄÅÊñπÂØπËá™Â∑±ÁöÑID‰ΩøÁî®MD5ÁÆóÊ≥ïËøõË°åÂä†ÂØÜÔºåÂπ∂ÊääÂä†ÂØÜÂêéÁöÑÂØÜÊñáIDÂèëÈÄÅÁªôÊé•Êî∂Êñπ
    • Êé•Êî∂ÊñπÊé•Êî∂Âà∞ÂèëÈÄÅÊñπÁöÑÂØÜÊñáID‰πãÂêéÔºåÂà©Áî®Ëá™Â∑±Â∑≤Áü•ÁöÑÂèëÈÄÅÊñπIDÔºàIDÂèåÊñπÂùáÂ∑≤Áü•ÔºåÊîªÂáªËÄÖÊú™Áü•ÔºâÂêåÊ†∑ÂØπÂèëÈÄÅÊñπÂéüÂßãIDËøõË°åMD5Âä†ÂØÜÔºåÂπ∂‰∏éÂèëÈÄÅÊñπÂèëÈÄÅÁöÑÂØÜÊñáIDËøõË°åÊØîËæÉÔºå
      • Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºåÁî±‰∫éMD5ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂÖ∑ÊúâÈõ™Â¥©ÊïàÂ∫îÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§ÂèØËÆ§‰∏∫ÂèëÈÄÅÊñπÂç≥‰∏∫Êú¨‰∫∫
      • Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏ç‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºåÂàôÁ´ãÂç≥‰∏≠Ê≠¢ÂØπËØùÔºå‰øùËØÅ‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÂÆâÂÖ®ÊÄß
    • Ë∫´‰ªΩÁ°ÆËÆ§‰πãÂêéÂç≥ÂèØËøõË°åÊ∂àÊÅØÂèëÈÄÅÊé•Êî∂
  2. Ë∫´‰ªΩÁ°ÆËÆ§‰πãÂêéÂà©Áî®RSAÂÖ¨Èí•‰ΩìÁ≥ªÂØπÂèåÊñπÂèëÈÄÅÊ∂àÊÅØËøõË°åÂä†ÂØÜÂíåËß£ÂØÜ
    • ÂèåÊñπËæìÂÖ•Ê∂àÊÅØÔºåÂà©Áî®RSAÂØπÊ∂àÊÅØËøõË°åÂä†ÂØÜÔºåÂπ∂ÊääÂä†ÂØÜÂêéÊ∂àÊÅØ‰ΩøÁî®TCPÂçèËÆÆËøõË°åÂèëÈÄÅÔºåËøôÊ†∑Âç≥‰æøÊ∂àÊÅØË¢´Êà™Ëé∑Ê≤°ÊúâÂØÜÈí•‰πüÊó†Ê≥ïÁ†¥ËØë
    • Êé•Êî∂ÊñπÊé•Êî∂Âà∞ÂØÜÊñáÂêéÔºåÂà©Áî®ÂØÜÈí•ÂØπÂÖ∂ËøõË°åËß£ÂØÜÂç≥ÂèØËé∑ÂèñÊ∂àÊÅØÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÂêåÊ†∑‰πüÂèØÂèëÈÄÅÊ∂àÊÅØ
      Âà©Áî®TCPÂçèËÆÆËøõË°åÊ∂àÊÅØÁöÑÊî∂ÂèëÔºåËøôÈáå‰ªÖÁî®Êù•ÂÆûÁé∞ÂèëÈÄÅÊ∂àÊÅØÔºåTCPÂçèËÆÆÁöÑÂÆâÂÖ®ÊÄßÊöÇ‰∏çËÄÉËôë

ÂÆûÈ™åËÆæËÆ°ÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæ

ÂÆûÈ™åÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

RSAÁÆóÊ≥ïÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

MD5ÁÆóÊ≥ïÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

MD5ÁÆóÊ≥ïÂÆûÁé∞Ë∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅ

  1. Ëé∑ÂèñËæìÂÖ•ÔºåËØ•Ê®°ÂùóÁî®‰∫éËé∑Âèñ‰∏ÄÊÆµÊòéÊñáÂ≠óÁ¨¶Ôºå‰∏çÂÆöÈïø

  2. ÂØπËé∑ÂèñÁöÑ‰∏çÂÆöÈïøÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËøõË°åÂ°´ÂÖÖ,‰ΩøÂÖ∂Â≠óËäÇÈïøÂ∫¶Êª°Ë∂≥n*512 + 448, Â°´ÂÖÖËßÑÂàôÊòØÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰ΩçÂ°´ÂÖÖ1ÔºåÂêéÁª≠Â°´ÂÖÖ0ÔºåÁõ¥Ëá≥Êª°Ë∂≥‰∏äËø∞Êù°‰ª∂ÔºåÊúÄÂêéÂÜçÁî®‰∏Ä‰∏™64‰∏∫‰∫åËøõÂà∂Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Ë°®Á§∫ÊòéÊñáÈïøÂ∫¶ÔºåËøôÊ†∑Â°´ÂÖÖ‰πãÂêéÈïøÂ∫¶‰∏∫(n + 1)*512

    // Â°´ÂÖÖÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤vector<unsigned int> padding(string src) {    // ‰ª•512‰Ωç,64‰∏™Â≠óËäÇ‰∏∫‰∏ÄÁªÑ    unsigned int num = ((src.length() + 8) / 64) + 1;    vector<unsigned int> rec(num*16);    strlength = num*16;    for(unsigned int i = 0; i < src.length(); i++){        // ‰∏Ä‰∏™unsigned intÂØπÂ∫î4‰∏™Â≠óËäÇÔºå‰øùÂ≠ò4‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰ø°ÊÅØ        rec[i>>2] |= (int)(src[i]) << ((i % 4) * 8);    }    // Ë°•ÂÖÖ1000...000    rec[src.length() >> 2] |= (0x80 << ((src.length() % 4)*8));    // Â°´ÂÖÖÂéüÊñáÈïøÂ∫¶    rec[rec.size()-2] = (src.length() << 3);    return rec;}

      • X[k]‰ª£Ë°®ÂΩìÂâçÂ§ÑÁêÜÊ∂àÊÅØÂàÜÁªÑÁöÑÁ¨¨k‰∏™32‰ΩçÂ≠óÔºåX[k]Áî±Á¨¨nËΩÆËø≠‰ª£ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÈ°∫Â∫èË°®ÂÜ≥ÂÆö

        // Âæ™ÁéØÂéãÁº© void iterateFunc(unsigned int* X, int size = 16) {     unsigned int a = tempA,                  b = tempB,                  c = tempC,                  d = tempD,                  rec = 0,                  g, k;     for(int i = 0; i < 64; i++) {         if(i < 16) {             // FËø≠‰ª£             g = F(b, c, d);             k = i;         }         else if(i < 32) {             // GËø≠‰ª£             g = G(b, c, d);             k = (1 + 5*i) % 16;         }         else if(i < 48) {             // HËø≠‰ª£             g = H(b, c, d);             k = (5 + 3*i) % 16;         }         else {             // IËø≠‰ª£             g = I(b, c, d);             k = (7*i) % 16;         }         rec = d;         d = c;         c = b;         b = b + shift(a + g + X[k] + T[i], s[i]);         a = rec;     }     tempA += a;     tempB += b;     tempC += c;     tempD += d; }

//ÁîüÊàêÂØÜÈí•ÂØπkey_pair * gen_key_pair() {    mpz_t * primes = gen_primes();     mpz_t key_n, key_e, key_f;    mpz_init(key_n);    mpz_init(key_f);    mpz_init_set_ui(key_e, 65537);    //ËÆæÁΩÆe‰∏∫65537     mpz_mul(key_n, primes[0], primes[1]);        //ËÆ°ÁÆón=p*q    mpz_sub_ui(primes[0], primes[0], 1);        //p=p-1    mpz_sub_ui(primes[1], primes[1], 1);        //q=q-1    mpz_mul(key_f, primes[0], primes[1]);        //ËÆ°ÁÆóÊ¨ßÊãâÂáΩÊï∞œÜ(n)=(p-1)*(q-1)     mpz_t key_d;        mpz_init(key_d);    mpz_invert(key_d, key_e, key_f);   //ËÆ°ÁÆóÊï∞ËÆ∫ÂÄíÊï∞     key_pair * result = new key_pair;     char * buf_n = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];    char * buf_d = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];     mpz_get_str(buf_n, BASE, key_n);    result->n = buf_n;    mpz_get_str(buf_d, BASE, key_d);    result->d = buf_d;    result->e = 65537;     mpz_clear(primes[0]);   //ÈáäÊîæÂÜÖÂ≠ò    mpz_clear(primes[1]);    mpz_clear(key_n);    mpz_clear(key_d);    mpz_clear(key_e);    mpz_clear(key_f);    delete []primes;    return result;}

#pragma once#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <cstdlib>#include <string>using namespace std;#define A 0x67452301#define B 0xefcdab89#define C 0x98badcfe#define D 0x10325476const char str16[] = "0123456789abcdef";const unsigned int T[] = {    0xd76aa478,0xe8c7b756,0x242070db,0xc1bdceee,    0xf57c0faf,0x4787c62a,0xa8304613,0xfd469501,    0x698098d8,0x8b44f7af,0xffff5bb1,0x895cd7be,    0x6b901122,0xfd987193,0xa679438e,0x49b40821,    0xf61e2562,0xc040b340,0x265e5a51,0xe9b6c7aa,    0xd62f105d,0x02441453,0xd8a1e681,0xe7d3fbc8,    0x21e1cde6,0xc33707d6,0xf4d50d87,0x455a14ed,    0xa9e3e905,0xfcefa3f8,0x676f02d9,0x8d2a4c8a,    0xfffa3942,0x8771f681,0x6d9d6122,0xfde5380c,    0xa4beea44,0x4bdecfa9,0xf6bb4b60,0xbebfbc70,    0x289b7ec6,0xeaa127fa,0xd4ef3085,0x04881d05,    0xd9d4d039,0xe6db99e5,0x1fa27cf8,0xc4ac5665,    0xf4292244,0x432aff97,0xab9423a7,0xfc93a039,    0x655b59c3,0x8f0ccc92,0xffeff47d,0x85845dd1,    0x6fa87e4f,0xfe2ce6e0,0xa3014314,0x4e0811a1,    0xf7537e82,0xbd3af235,0x2ad7d2bb,0xeb86d391 };const unsigned int s[] = { 7,12,17,22,7,12,17,22,7,12,17,22,7,12,17,22,                           5,9,14,20,5,9,14,20,5,9,14,20,5,9,14,20,                           4,11,16,23,4,11,16,23,4,11,16,23,4,11,16,23,                           6,10,15,21,6,10,15,21,6,10,15,21,6,10,15,21};// Á¨¨‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜÊòØË¶ÅËøõË°å HASH ËøêÁÆóÁöÑÂéüÂßãÊòéÊñáÔºåÁ¨¨‰∫åÈÉ®ÂàÜÂàôÊòØÂÖ∂ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑ HASH ÂÄºstatic const struct data{    string msg;    unsigned char hash[16];}tests[] = {    { "",      { 0xd4, 0x1d, 0x8c, 0xd9, 0x8f, 0x00, 0xb2, 0x04,         0xe9, 0x80, 0x09, 0x98, 0xec, 0xf8, 0x42, 0x7e } },    { "a",      {0x0c, 0xc1, 0x75, 0xb9, 0xc0, 0xf1, 0xb6, 0xa8,        0x31, 0xc3, 0x99, 0xe2, 0x69, 0x77, 0x26, 0x61 } },    { "abc",      { 0x90, 0x01, 0x50, 0x98, 0x3c, 0xd2, 0x4f, 0xb0,         0xd6, 0x96, 0x3f, 0x7d, 0x28, 0xe1, 0x7f, 0x72 } },    { "message digest",       { 0xf9, 0x6b, 0x69, 0x7d, 0x7c, 0xb7, 0x93, 0x8d,         0x52, 0x5a, 0x2f, 0x31, 0xaa, 0xf1, 0x61, 0xd0 } },     { "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz",      { 0xc3, 0xfc, 0xd3, 0xd7, 0x61, 0x92, 0xe4, 0x00,         0x7d, 0xfb, 0x49, 0x6c, 0xca, 0x67, 0xe1, 0x3b } },    { "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789",      { 0xd1, 0x74, 0xab, 0x98, 0xd2, 0x77, 0xd9, 0xf5,         0xa5, 0x61, 0x1c, 0x2c, 0x9f, 0x41, 0x9d, 0x9f } },    { "12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890",      { 0x57, 0xed, 0xf4, 0xa2, 0x2b, 0xe3, 0xc9, 0x55,         0xac, 0x49, 0xda, 0x2e, 0x21, 0x07, 0xb6, 0x7a } },};class MD5 {private:    unsigned int tempA, tempB, tempC, tempD, strlength;public:    MD5() {        tempA = A;        tempB = B;        tempC = C;        tempD = D;        strlength = 0;    }    // Â°´ÂÖÖÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤    vector<unsigned int> padding(string src) {        // ‰ª•512‰Ωç,64‰∏™Â≠óËäÇ‰∏∫‰∏ÄÁªÑ        unsigned int num = ((src.length() + 8) / 64) + 1;        vector<unsigned int> rec(num*16);        strlength = num*16;        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < src.length(); i++){            // ‰∏Ä‰∏™unsigned intÂØπÂ∫î4‰∏™Â≠óËäÇÔºå‰øùÂ≠ò4‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰ø°ÊÅØ            rec[i>>2] |= (int)(src[i]) << ((i % 4) * 8);        }        // Ë°•ÂÖÖ1000...000        rec[src.length() >> 2] |= (0x80 << ((src.length() % 4)*8));        // Â°´ÂÖÖÂéüÊñáÈïøÂ∫¶        rec[rec.size()-2] = (src.length() << 3);        return rec;    }    // FÂáΩÊï∞    unsigned int F(unsigned int b, unsigned int c, unsigned int d) {        return (b & c) | ((~b) & d);    }    // GÂáΩÊï∞    unsigned int G(unsigned int b, unsigned int c, unsigned int d) {        return (b & d) | (c & (~d));    }    // HÂáΩÊï∞    unsigned int H(unsigned int b, unsigned int c, unsigned int d) {        return b ^ c ^ d;    }    // IÂáΩÊï∞    unsigned int I(unsigned int b, unsigned int c, unsigned int d) {        return c ^ (b | (~d));    }    // Áßª‰ΩçÊìç‰ΩúÂáΩÊï∞    unsigned int shift(unsigned int a, unsigned int n) {        return (a << n) | (a >> (32 - n));    }    // Âæ™ÁéØÂéãÁº©    void iterateFunc(unsigned int* X, int size = 16) {        unsigned int a = tempA,                     b = tempB,                     c = tempC,                     d = tempD,                     rec = 0,                     g, k;        for(int i = 0; i < 64; i++) {            if(i < 16) {                // FËø≠‰ª£                g = F(b, c, d);                k = i;            }            else if(i < 32) {                // GËø≠‰ª£                g = G(b, c, d);                k = (1 + 5*i) % 16;            }            else if(i < 48) {                // HËø≠‰ª£                g = H(b, c, d);                k = (5 + 3*i) % 16;            }            else {                // IËø≠‰ª£                g = I(b, c, d);                k = (7*i) % 16;            }            rec = d;            d = c;            c = b;            b = b + shift(a + g + X[k] + T[i], s[i]);            a = rec;        }        tempA += a;        tempB += b;        tempC += c;        tempD += d;    }    // Êï¥ÁêÜËæìÂá∫    string format(unsigned int num) {        string res = "";        unsigned int base = 1 << 8;        for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {            string tmp = "";            unsigned int b = (num >> (i * 8)) % base & 0xff;            for(int j = 0; j < 2; j++) {                tmp = str16[b%16] + tmp;                b /= 16;            }            res += tmp;        }        return res;    }    // ÁºñÁ†ÅÂáΩÊï∞    string encode(string src) {        vector<unsigned int> rec = padding(src);        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < strlength/16; i++) {            unsigned int num[16];            for(int j = 0; j < 16; j++) {                num[j] = rec[i*16+j];            }            iterateFunc(num, 16);        }        return format(tempA) + format(tempB) + format(tempC) + format(tempD);    }};

generateKey.cpp

#include <cstdio>#include <ctime>#include <cstring>#include <cstdlib>#include <iostream>#include <gmp.h> #define KEY_LENGTH 2048  //ÂÖ¨Èí•ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶#define BASE 16    //ËæìÂÖ•ËæìÂá∫ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óËøõÂà∂ using namespace std; struct key_pair {    string n;    string d;    int e;}; //ÁîüÊàê‰∏§‰∏™Â§ßÁ¥†Êï∞mpz_t * gen_primes(){                                            gmp_randstate_t grt;                    gmp_randinit_default(grt);        gmp_randseed_ui(grt, time(NULL));            mpz_t key_p, key_q;    mpz_init(key_p);    mpz_init(key_q);     mpz_urandomb(key_p, grt, KEY_LENGTH / 2);            mpz_urandomb(key_q, grt, KEY_LENGTH / 2);    //ÈöèÊú∫ÁîüÊàê‰∏§‰∏™Â§ßÊï¥Êï∞     mpz_t * result = new mpz_t[2];    mpz_init(result[0]);    mpz_init(result[1]);     mpz_nextprime(result[0], key_p);  //‰ΩøÁî®GMPËá™Â∏¶ÁöÑÁ¥†Êï∞ÁîüÊàêÂáΩÊï∞    mpz_nextprime(result[1], key_q);     mpz_clear(key_p);    mpz_clear(key_q);     return result;    } //ÁîüÊàêÂØÜÈí•ÂØπkey_pair * gen_key_pair(){    mpz_t * primes = gen_primes();     mpz_t key_n, key_e, key_f;    mpz_init(key_n);    mpz_init(key_f);    mpz_init_set_ui(key_e, 65537);    //ËÆæÁΩÆe‰∏∫65537     mpz_mul(key_n, primes[0], primes[1]);        //ËÆ°ÁÆón=p*q    mpz_sub_ui(primes[0], primes[0], 1);        //p=p-1    mpz_sub_ui(primes[1], primes[1], 1);        //q=q-1    mpz_mul(key_f, primes[0], primes[1]);        //ËÆ°ÁÆóÊ¨ßÊãâÂáΩÊï∞œÜ(n)=(p-1)*(q-1)     mpz_t key_d;        mpz_init(key_d);    mpz_invert(key_d, key_e, key_f);   //ËÆ°ÁÆóÊï∞ËÆ∫ÂÄíÊï∞     key_pair * result = new key_pair;     char * buf_n = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];    char * buf_d = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];     mpz_get_str(buf_n, BASE, key_n);    result->n = buf_n;    mpz_get_str(buf_d, BASE, key_d);    result->d = buf_d;    result->e = 65537;     mpz_clear(primes[0]);   //ÈáäÊîæÂÜÖÂ≠ò    mpz_clear(primes[1]);    mpz_clear(key_n);    mpz_clear(key_d);    mpz_clear(key_e);    mpz_clear(key_f);    delete []primes;    return result;}key_pair* getKey (char name) {    key_pair * p = gen_key_pair();     cout << "n = " << p->n << endl;    cout << "d = " << p->d << endl;    cout << "e = " << p->e << endl;    cout << name << "s public key is:(" << p->n << ", " << p->e << ")" << endl << endl; //ËæìÂá∫ÂÖ¨Èí•(n, e)    cout << name << "s private key is:(" << p->n << ", " << p->d << ")" << endl << endl; //ËæìÂá∫ÁßÅÈí•(n, d)    return p;}void generateABKey() {    key_pair * A = getKey('A');    key_pair * B = getKey('B');}int main(){            generateABKey();    return 0;}

Server.h

#pragma once#include <cstdio>#include <ctime>#include <cstring>#include <cstdlib>#include <iostream>#include <gmp.h>#include "MD5.h" #define KEY_LENGTH 2048  //ÂÖ¨Èí•ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶#define BASE 16    //ËæìÂÖ•ËæìÂá∫ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óËøõÂà∂ using namespace std; struct key_pair{    string n;    string d;    int e;    string k;};key_pair* key = new key_pair;void keyInit() {    key->n = "";    key->d = "";    key->e = 65537;    key->k = "";}//Âä†ÂØÜÂáΩÊï∞char * encrypt(const char * plain_text, const char * key_n, int key_e)  {    mpz_t M, C1, n;    mpz_init_set_str(M, plain_text, BASE);     mpz_init_set_str(n, key_n, BASE);    mpz_init_set_ui(C1, 0);     mpz_powm_ui(C1, M, key_e, n);    //‰ΩøÁî®GMP‰∏≠Ê®°ÂπÇËÆ°ÁÆóÂáΩÊï∞     char * result = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];    mpz_get_str(result, BASE, C1);     return result;} //Ëß£ÂØÜÂáΩÊï∞char * decrypt(const char * cipher_text, const char * key_n, const char * key_d)  {    mpz_t M, C1, n, d;    mpz_init_set_str(C1, cipher_text, BASE);     mpz_init_set_str(n, key_n, BASE);    mpz_init_set_str(d, key_d, BASE);    mpz_init(M);     mpz_powm(M, C1, d, n);   //‰ΩøÁî®GMP‰∏≠ÁöÑÊ®°ÂπÇËÆ°ÁÆóÂáΩÊï∞     char * result = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];    mpz_get_str(result, BASE, M);     return result;}string getTime() {//Êó∂Èó¥ÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™Êó∂Èó¥Êà≥    time_t timep;    time(&timep);    char tmp[64];    strftime(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", localtime(&timep));    return tmp;}bool IdConfirm (string ID, string name) {    MD5 tmp;    string hash = tmp.encode(name);    if (ID.compare(hash)) {        return false;    }    return true;}

Server.cpp

#include<iostream>#include<stdio.h>#include<string.h>#include<winsock.h>#include<time.h>#include"windows.h"#include "server.h"#pragma comment(lib,"ws2_32.lib")//Âä†ËΩΩws2_32.dll#define BUF_SIZE 4096   //ÊåáÂÆöËÅäÂ§©‰ø°ÊÅØÁºìÂÜ≤Âå∫Â§ßÂ∞èusing namespace std;int main() {    WSADATA wsaData;    WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(2, 2), &wsaData);    SOCKET server = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);//ÂàõÂª∫serverÂ•óÊé•Â≠óÔºåÈááÁî®ipv4Âú∞ÂùÄÔºåÈªòËÆ§TCPÂçèËÆÆ    sockaddr_in server_addr;    memset(&server_addr, 0, sizeof(server_addr));    server_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;//Â•óÊé•Â≠óÂú∞ÂùÄ‰πüÈááÁî®IPv4Âú∞ÂùÄ    server_addr.sin_addr.S_un.S_addr = inet_addr("127.0.0.1");//Êú¨Êú∫Âú∞ÂùÄ    server_addr.sin_port = htons(1234);//Á´ØÂè£Âè∑    bind(server, (SOCKADDR*)&server_addr, sizeof(server_addr));//Â∞ÜÂ•óÊé•Â≠óÂíåÂú∞ÂùÄÁªëÂÆö    char server_name[2048] = { 0 };//Áî≥ËØ∑‰∏Ä‰∏™2048Â≠óËäÇÁöÑÁºìÂÜ≤Âå∫ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂÇ®Â≠òÊúçÂä°Âô®ÁöÑÂêçÁß∞    char server_name_tmp[2048] = { 0 };    cout << getTime() << " " << "Please enter your nickname:";    cin.getline(server_name_tmp, 2048);  //gets()      cout << getTime() << " " << "Waiting for connection...\n";    listen(server, 1);//ËøõÂÖ•ÁõëÂê¨Áä∂ÊÄÅÔºåÊï∞Â≠ó1Ë°®Á§∫ÈòüÂàó‰∏≠Âè™ËÉΩÂ≠òÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™ËØ∑Ê±Ç    /*ÊúçÂä°Âô®Â∑≤ÁªèÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊØïÔºåÁ≠âÂæÖÂÆ¢Êà∑Êú∫ËøûÊé•*/    char client_name[2048] = { 0 };    SOCKET client;    SOCKADDR_IN client_addr;    int client_addr_len = sizeof(client_addr);    while (true) {        client = accept(server, (SOCKADDR*)&client_addr, &client_addr_len);        if (client == INVALID_SOCKET) {            cout << getTime() << " " << "Connection failed.\n" << WSAGetLastError();        }        else {            cout << getTime() << " " << "Connection succeeded!!!\n";            break;        }    }        char buffer[BUF_SIZE] = { 0 };    char buffer_send[BUF_SIZE + 100] = { 0 };    char buffer_receive[BUF_SIZE + 100] = { 0 };    int receive_len = 0;    int send_len = 0;    /*ÈÄöËøáÂª∫Á´ãÁöÑËøûÊé•ËøõË°åÈÄö‰ø°*/    //ÂèëÈÄÅÂíåÊé•ÂèóÂÆ¢Êà∑Á´Ø‰∏éÊúçÂä°Á´ØÁöÑÂêçÂ≠ó      MD5 tmp_name;    string tmp_s = tmp_name.encode(server_name_tmp);    for (int i = 0; i < tmp_s.length(); i++) {        server_name[i] = tmp_s[i];    }    send_len = send(client, server_name, sizeof(server_name), 0);    receive_len = recv(client, client_name, sizeof(client_name), 0);        SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), FOREGROUND_INTENSITY|FOREGROUND_RED);    cout << endl;    if (IdConfirm(client_name, "lkp2")) {        cout << "ID Confirm success, Let's chatting..." << endl << endl;    } else {        cout << "ID Confirm failed, Conversation aborted...";        SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY|FOREGROUND_RED|FOREGROUND_GREEN|FOREGROUND_BLUE);        return 0;    }    keyInit();    SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY|FOREGROUND_RED|FOREGROUND_GREEN|FOREGROUND_BLUE);    cout << "Please enter the message(just number) you want to send, or enter \"12582\" to abort this conversation, or enter \"12581\" to abort this chat" << endl;    while (true) {        while (true) {//Êé•Êî∂Ê∂àÊÅØ            memset(buffer_receive, 0, sizeof(buffer_receive));//ÂàùÂßãÂåñÁºìÂÜ≤Âå∫              receive_len = recv(client, buffer_receive, sizeof(buffer_receive), 0);            //string tmp(buffer_receive);            string tmp = decrypt(buffer_receive, key->n.data(), key->d.data());            if (strcmp(buffer_receive, "12581") == 0) {//Â¶ÇÊûúËÅäÂ§©ÂÜÖÂÆπ‰∏≠Âê´Êúâ12581ÔºåÂàôÈÄÄÂá∫ËÅäÂ§©ÔºåÂÖ≥Èó≠socket                SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), FOREGROUND_INTENSITY);                cout << "The program will exit in 3 seconds..." << endl;                Sleep(1000);                cout << "The program will exit in 2 seconds..." << endl;                Sleep(1000);                cout << "The program will exit in 1 seconds...";                Sleep(1000);                SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY|FOREGROUND_RED|FOREGROUND_GREEN|FOREGROUND_BLUE);//ÊÅ¢Â§çÂéüÊù•ÁöÑÈ¢úËâ≤                closesocket(server);                closesocket(client);                WSACleanup();                return 0;            }            else if (strcmp(buffer_receive, "12582") == 0)//Â¶ÇÊûúËÅäÂ§©ÂÜÖÂÆπ‰∏≠Âê´Êúâ12582ÔºåÂàôÊú¨ÂõûÂêàËÅäÂ§©ÁªìÊùüÔºå‰∏çÁÑ∂ÂèØ‰ª•ÁªßÁª≠ÂèëÈÄÅ‰ø°ÊÅØ                break;            SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | FOREGROUND_BLUE);//ËÆæÁΩÆËìùËâ≤            if (tmp.find("0") != string::npos) {                continue;            }            cout << tmp << endl;            cout << "----------------------Detail--------------------" << endl << "Message:" << tmp << endl;            cout << "Ciphertext:" << buffer_receive << endl;            cout << "----------------------Detail--------------------" << endl;        }        while (true) {//ÂèëÈÄÅÊ∂àÊÅØ            memset(buffer, 0, sizeof(buffer));//Ê∏ÖÁ©∫ÁºìÂÜ≤Âå∫            memset(buffer_send, 0, sizeof(buffer_send));            SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | FOREGROUND_GREEN);//ËÆæÁΩÆÁªøËâ≤            string tmp_time = getTime();            cout << tmp_time << " " << server_name_tmp << ":";            cin.getline(buffer, BUF_SIZE);            if (strcmp(buffer, "12582") == 0) {                send_len = send(client, buffer, sizeof(buffer), 0);                break;            }            else if (strcmp(buffer, "12581") == 0) {                send_len = send(client, buffer, sizeof(buffer), 0);                SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), FOREGROUND_INTENSITY);                cout << "The program will exit in 3 seconds..." << endl;                Sleep(1000);                cout << "The program will exit in 2 seconds..." << endl;                Sleep(1000);                cout << "The program will exit in 1 seconds...";                Sleep(1000);                SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY|FOREGROUND_RED|FOREGROUND_GREEN|FOREGROUND_BLUE);//ÊÅ¢Â§çÂéüÊù•ÁöÑÈ¢úËâ≤                closesocket(server);                closesocket(client);                WSACleanup();                return 0;            }            cout << "----------------------Detail--------------------" << endl << "Message:" << buffer << endl;            char* tmp = encrypt(buffer, key->k.data(), key->e);            cout << "Ciphertext:" << tmp << endl;            cout << "----------------------Detail--------------------" << endl;            char tmp1[10240];            strncpy(tmp1, tmp, strlen(tmp) + 1);            send_len = send(client, tmp1, sizeof(tmp1), 0);        }    }    return 0;}

#pragma once#include <cstdio>#include <ctime>#include <cstring>#include <cstdlib>#include <iostream>#include <gmp.h>#include "MD5.h"#define KEY_LENGTH 2048  //ÂÖ¨Èí•ÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶#define BASE 16    //ËæìÂÖ•ËæìÂá∫ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óËøõÂà∂ using namespace std; struct key_pair{    string n;    string d;    int e;    string k;};key_pair* key = new key_pair;void keyInit() {    key->n = "";    key->d = "";    key->e = 65537;    key->k = "";}//Âä†ÂØÜÂáΩÊï∞char * encrypt(char * plain_text, const char * key_n, int key_e)  {    mpz_t M, C1, n;    mpz_init_set_str(M, plain_text, BASE);     mpz_init_set_str(n, key_n, BASE);    mpz_init_set_ui(C1, 0);     mpz_powm_ui(C1, M, key_e, n);    //‰ΩøÁî®GMP‰∏≠Ê®°ÂπÇËÆ°ÁÆóÂáΩÊï∞     char * result = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];    mpz_get_str(result, BASE, C1);     return result;} //Ëß£ÂØÜÂáΩÊï∞char * decrypt(char * cipher_text, const char * key_n, const char * key_d)  {    mpz_t M, C1, n, d;    mpz_init_set_str(C1, cipher_text, BASE);     mpz_init_set_str(n, key_n, BASE);    mpz_init_set_str(d, key_d, BASE);    mpz_init(M);     mpz_powm(M, C1, d, n);   //‰ΩøÁî®GMP‰∏≠ÁöÑÊ®°ÂπÇËÆ°ÁÆóÂáΩÊï∞     char * result = new char[KEY_LENGTH + 10];    mpz_get_str(result, BASE, M);     return result;}string getTime() {    time_t timep;    time(&timep);    char tmp[64];    strftime(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", localtime(&timep));    return tmp;}bool IdConfirm (string ID, string name) {    MD5 tmp;    string hash = tmp.encode(name);    if (ID.compare(hash)) {        return false;    }    return true;}
